MATERIALS AND METHODSWastewaterThe wastewater used in the experiments was mill discharge effluent treated in an activated sludge unit and a final sedimentation unit. As there were substantial variations in the water quality measurements even from moment to moment, in order to avoid the effects of such variations on the treatment results, a combined effluent of 1000 L was equalized in a homogenization tank before use in each set of experiments.ApparatusFigure 1 presents a schematic diagram of the treatment system used in the study. The system was composed of a perfectly mixed homogenization tank of 1000 L, a 65-L pilot-scale pulsed electrocoagulation reactor; a 78-L aerator; a 100-L flocculation tank, allowing the floc sufficient time to grow; and a 120-L sedimentation unit.A pulsed electrochemical reactor (Model JC-10) developed by Jye-shi Environmental Technologies and Engineering (Chungho, Taiwan) was used in the study. The reactor is shown in Fig. 2 and is capable of treating 0.1~0.5 m3/h of wastewater with an HRT of 0.13~0.65 h.There are 16 electrolytic cells inside the reactor, separated by cast iron plates which served as electrodes. Figure 3 shows the setup of the electrodes. For the reactor, the relationship between current density and voltage is indicated in Table 1. The operational current density for the reactor was between 40 and 240 A/m2, and the electrical potential per cell was 2.3~8.3 V.Operating ProceduresUntreated wastewater was first pumped into the homogenization tank for equalization. Then each set of experiments was carried out with 1000 L of equalized wastewater that was fed to the reactor for treatment. Further, the treated wastewater passed through an aerator and flocculation tank, and then flowed into a sedimentation unit for sludge settling. Air was supplied to the aerator by a 3-hp compressor and air diffuser. Based on a particular set of operating conditions chosen, polymer coagulant (an anionic polyacrylamide) was added to the flocculation tank. The sludge settled in the sedimentation unit was collected and subsequently dewatered.During operation, the polarity of the electrodes was switched every 30~60 s to avoid excessive iron plate erosion. The switching of polarity also produced a pulsed effect that caused dipole inductions in non-polar insoluble substances in the wastewater.Three sets of experiments were conducted, with each set being performed with one specific HRT, four current densities, and three coagulant dosages; excluding the conditions of zero current density and zero coagulant dosage, each set contained 25 experiments.Operating ConditionsThe values of the three operating variables studied were current densities of 0, 40, 107, 187, and 240 A/m2; HRTs in the reactor of 0, 8, 10, and 16 min; and coagulant dosages of 0, 9, and 22 mg/L. The temperature and pH were not controlled in any of the experiments, because these two parameters varied with the untreated wastewater quality, HRT, and the current density applied. Consequently, the operative pH ranged between 7.6 and 8.0, and the temperature varied between 22.1 and 29.4 °C.Instruments and Methods for Chemical AnalysesA Suntex (NIEA W203.51) BSC-170 conductivity meter was used for conductivity, an NIEA model W210.56A was used for SS; an NIEA W517.50B model was used for COD; a Hach model 2100P (NIEA W219.51C) was used for turbidity; a Mettler-Toledo MP220 (NIEA W217.51A) was used for pH; and a Hach model DR/4000, with a wavelength range of 190~1100 nm and wavelength accuracy of ± 1 nm (NIEA W223.50B), was used to measure true color.The electrical conductivity, SS content, COD, turbidity, pH, and temperature of the equalized wastewater were measured before and after treatment. Measurements of iron contents of untreated and treated wastewaters were made for a set of experiments run at different current densities for a fixed HRT and without the addition of coagulant.

Application of a Pilot-Scale Pulsed Electrocoagulation System to OCC-Based Paper Mill Effluent
Preservation and mildew control of wood materials

木材本身是一種高分子有機聚合體，構成其主成分的纖維素、半纖維素與木質素等極易受到外在環境因子的生物如腐朽菌、昆蟲等危害，此結果不但降低了木材的使用價值，也造成了極鉅的生命財產損失。 以銅、鉻、砷元素為主的鉻化砷酸銅（Chromated Copper Arsenate, CCA）是一種全世界普遍使用的木材防腐藥劑，其效用可使木材在大部分的環境下免於昆蟲與腐朽菌的危害。然而，由於環境污染的問題，近年來這些防腐藥劑在有些國家已經被禁止使用。因此，不含鉻與砷的防腐藥劑與低污染性的防腐藥劑如銅烷基銨化合物（Alkaline Copper Quats, ACQ）與當耐力CY（Tanalith CY, TCY）等在美國已逐步的被開發與應用。銅烷基銨化合物與當耐力CY處理材之耐腐朽性與抗白蟻性是由於其藥劑中之金屬離子在木材中產生固著或沉澱，因此其藥劑之淋溶性亦將影響到環境之污染問題。然而，迄今並無標準之試驗方法來評估此類防腐藥劑之固著性，因此在此類防腐藥劑應用於我國木材加工業前，實有必要瞭解其處理材之耐腐朽性、抗白蟻性與藥劑淋溶性，以降低或減少其對於環境之影響。所以，本研究擬進行銅烷基銨化合物與當耐力CY處理材之室內與田野試驗，由試驗結果可以提供我國木材加工業生產更符合環保與安全性之木製品。又木材極易受到環境溫濕度影響，且無法避免遭受霉菌等微生物之危害，因而產生腐朽並降低木材之品質，本研究計畫擬採用聚對二甲苯（polypara-xylylenes）真空鍍膜技術與幾丁聚醣塗裝等方法以進行木材表面處理，期能藉由高分子聚合物之沉積於木材表面，以改善木質材料之吸濕性與易滋生霉菌等缺點，藉以達到改善木材表面性質之目的，進而確保持木製的綠色產品能長保如新之目標，克服木材表面之霉害劣化，進而延長其使用年限。

新型水溶性木材防腐藥劑之效能及其對於環境之影響1.腐朽及蟲害情形之檢測：定期前往福山、蓮華池與中埔等三研究中心進行取樣各種處理材5支，觀測與紀錄各種處理試材外表遭受腐朽及蟲害情形。2.重量損失率測定：將前述試材攜回試驗室，並將其放置於105℃烘箱乾燥一天後，放置於乾燥皿中冷卻，測定其重量之減輕量。3.重金屬流失率測定：將前述乾燥試材以粉碎機打成粉末，再秤量1g木粉並壓製成圓盤，而後再以x射線元素測試儀測定其重金屬含量變化情形。4.靜曲強度試驗：以萬能強度試驗機測試各處理材埋置後經時之力學性質變化情形。x射線元素測試儀、萬能強度試驗機。幾丁聚醣應用於木質材料霉害防除之探討1.幾丁聚醣處理木材之防霉性能評估：取實際篩選、純化之各種木材表面最具代表性之霉菌菌株（ Aspergillus niger, Aspergillus flavus, Trichoderma viride），分別接種於各試驗材料表面，而後將處理後之試材置入25℃培養箱中，以PDA培養基進行霉菌培養試驗，藉以評估各種防霉藥劑之抗霉效能。2.幾丁聚醣處理試材耐久性之評估：分為室內人工試驗及戶外曝露試驗方式進行耐久性評估。3.幾丁聚醣處理木材之性質分析與測定：包括：顏色變化、、接觸角、顯微結構、防霉性能、表面化學官能基之評估與分析。人工耐候試驗機、紅外線光譜儀、色差計、接觸角計、掃描式電子顯微鏡。聚對二甲苯鍍膜處理應用於木材表面性質之改良1.適用於木材表面處理聚對二甲苯種類之篩選及最佳鍍膜膜厚之評估。2.鍍膜處理材之顏色變化、潤性能（接觸角）、顯微結構、化學官能基之分析與測定。3.聚對二甲苯鍍膜處理試材耐久性之評估：分為室內人工試驗（UVB-313燈管加速照光劣化）及戶外曝露試驗方式進行耐久性評估。人工耐候試驗機、紅外線光譜儀、色差計、接觸角計。

Ecological Monitoring in Riparian Zones of Liukuei Experimental Forest (4/5)

Ecological monitoring sites of riparian zones was established along Chungliao and Shanping creeks within Liukuei Experimental Forest for measurement of streamflow characteristics, water quality variation, streambed stability, vegetation diversity, wildlife species, and freshwater fishes density. If streamflow characteristics, water quality variation, streambed stability, vegetaion diversity, wildlife species, and freshwater fishes density still kept good condition during the past monitoring periods, the riparian management of Liukuei Experimental Forest do not need a special conservation planning. If streamflow characteristics, water quality variation, streambed stability, vegetation diversity, wildlife species, and freshwater density were getting to worse condition, a special improvement conservation planning would be necessary in the riparian management of Liukuei Experimental Forest.

Chungliao and Shanping Creeks, Liukuei, Kaoshung County, Taiwan120.6583120.716723.011122.9556

Eco-materials will be formed using thinning small-diameter wood and　agro-forest waste　as starting raw materials; and inorganic cement adhesives will be solidified carbon dioxide injection. Raw materials will be grinded into particle or disintegrated into fiber, mixed with various ratio of Portland cement, then pressed into panels and aged for one week. Surface burning characteristics, thermal properties, heat release rates of the produced panels will be evaluated by surface tester, thermal gravimetrical analyzer, and cone calorimeter. Impacts of production condition on panel properties will be studied to ensure agro-forest waste utilization conducted following principles of eco-materials.

林業試驗所昆蟲標本館典藏標本

林業試驗所昆蟲標本館是臺灣重要的昆蟲標本館之一，保存許多蛾類和胡蜂標本。館藏的最早標本來自日據時代，迄今已超過半世紀，之後的昆蟲專家如楊英烈、張玉珍等，亦陸續採集許多重要森林昆蟲標本，其中不乏目前已消失的種類（如大樺斑蝶、大紫斑蝶），這些標本都十分珍貴。 本所自日據時代至1992年至少已累積15,000份之森林昆蟲標本，其後積極從事採集、製作，2010年浸液標本超過30萬份，針插乾燥標本已超過11萬4千份，其中不乏珍貴稀有種類，這些標本可為森林資源保育以及森林蟲害防治等工作奠定堅實的基礎。不過，本所過去之森林昆蟲標本未有規格化，標本一則不夠完整，再則缺乏整體維護，因此亟需建立有效之標本管理系統。所以全面改善本所現有之森林昆蟲標本及其儲藏環境，以免前人累積之珍貴標本資產及相關資料失傳，遂為本所一項重要工作。所幸經過同仁數年之努力，標本之保存及維護硬體已逐漸步上軌道。 本館所有昆蟲標本已於2000年2-3月移至森林保育大樓四樓之昆蟲標本館，館內之移動標本櫃材質堅固，使用方便，室內並維持24小時20 ±2℃、55 ±5%相對溼度之恆定狀態。本所昆蟲標本館典藏條件已達國際水準，可以長久保存台灣豐富的自然資產。2004年昆蟲標本館資料庫管理系統之建置已完成，所有針插標本標本基本資料（流水編號、採集時間、採集地點、採集人）均已建立資料庫，而且全數完成條碼(barcode)籤的針插工作，這項工作領先全球其他昆蟲典藏，對於日後的標本管理以及標本出借（loan）、交換上，都有很大的幫助。透過網路的方便性，直接提供一般民眾查詢森林害蟲相關資訊，提高蟲害的防治效率。具備這樣的條件，林試所的昆蟲典藏及管理邁入新的紀元，足以為國內及國際社會提供更多的知識與服務。

Genetic differentiation of eulophid wasp Quadrastichus erythrinae Kim (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) from various Erythrina hosts based on mitochondrial and nuclear genes

Many Erythrina trees were found wilting initially and suffering die-back later due to severe infestations by Quadrastichus erythrinae (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) in Mauritius, Réunion, and Singapore since 2000. It then has widely spread into various countries in tropical and subtropical areas. Various degrees of damage and different symptoms were observed on different host species which raised a question whether the pest belong to same species or not. In order to measure the differentiation of the Erythrina eulophid wasps from different geographic area and host plants, 36 samples from 14 localities of Taiwan and 11 samples from Singapore and Mauritius were collected. Singapore and Mauritius was two of the three countries included in the original description of the new species of Quadrastichus erythrinae Kim. We analyzed mitochondrial genes of 12S ribosomal RNA and cytochrome oxidase I, and nuclear sequence of intergenic spacer 2 to understand their genetic variation and phylogenetic relationship. Sequences of the same region in all the three genes are identical among all the samples. The homogeneity of the genetic composition suggests that there were no cryptic species in the samples. It confirms that all the wasps sampled in this study, despite their different origins in areas and hosts, are belong to the same species. Apparently, all the pests in these countries came from the same monomorphic genotype which quickly and widely spread to other areas.

In order to measure geographic variation and to identify the Erythrina eulophid wasps from different host plants, samples from various areas and hosts were collected. These included 36 samples from 14 localities of Taiwan and 11 samples from Singapore and Mauritius (Table 1). Singapore and Mauritius was two of the three countries included in the original description of the new species of Quadrastichus erythrinae Kim. Samples of Taiwan were collected from six Erythrina taxa, including 19 samples from E. variegata, 10 from E. variegata var. orientalis, 3 from E. corallodendron, 2 from E. crista-galli, 1 from E. abyssinica, and 1 from E. berteroana. Samples outside Taiwan covers 7 from E. fusca in Singapore and 4 from E. variegata in Mauritius.

紫斑蝶棲地保育自動化監測系統規劃與研究(3/4)

每年秋末冬初之際，成千上萬的紫斑蝶類會集中在南部某些低海拔的森林中越冬，翌年春天，這些紫斑蝶才會離開牠們的越冬棲地。本計畫選擇六龜鄉三個紫斑蝶越冬棲地，採用自動化遠端監測方式（包括自動監測、ADSL寬頻傳輸、多媒體影像資料庫技術）收集、分析、研究紫斑蝶越冬棲地環境位置、溫度、濕度、日照度、風速風向以及紫斑蝶數量與活動之數據與影像資料，以建立紫斑蝶越冬棲地保育基礎資料與生態監測系統結構。94、95年度已建立完成棲地一之5個完整的監測站，以及棲地二之2個監測點。本年度預定選擇六龜鄉紫斑蝶越冬棲地二選擇另一監測點，架設鐵塔，於鐵塔上裝設微波收發訊機，將微波信號轉送至林業試驗所六龜研究中心「森林數位站」，以提高生態資訊傳輸之容量及速率。（2）既有維修、保養監測網電力、管線與監測設備（3）維持通訊穩定、系統穩定度

Content: Jung-TaiChaoTFRI研究員兼副所長台北市南海路53號Taipei100(02)23039978*1206(02)23757469jtchao@tfri.gov.tw

重要工作項目及實施方法選擇六龜鄉紫斑蝶越冬棲地二選擇另一監測點，進行紫斑蝶棲地的生態環境調查、研究與分析：1.紫斑蝶自動化監測系統維護與改進(1)設置微波系統，作為棲地間及數位站傳輸電路取代現有之ADSL，提高傳輸頻寬於棲地監測點架設鐵塔，於鐵塔上裝設微波收發訊機，裝設鐵塔並架設微波中繼裝置，將微波信號轉送至林業試驗所六龜研究中心鐵塔上裝設微波收發訊機，再傳送至「森林數位站」，透過「森林數位站」電路聯至網際網路，以提高生態觀測之容量及速率。(2)監測網電力、管線與監測設備維修與保養由於六龜地區夏季、秋季颱風來襲，經常帶來豪大雨，造成土石崩塌，以致於監測網之電力、管線與監測設備損壞，需檢修以保持正常運作。監測網之監測設備由於安裝於野外，亦需保養測試以供維持正常運作。(3)維持通訊穩定、系統穩定度六龜地區之電力、電壓不穩定，本計畫已安裝備援電力及穩壓裝置UPS，以維持瞬間斷電及電壓不穩定時之正常運轉。但如斷電時間超過續電能量，仍需人為重新開機啟動系統。目前之ADSL寬頻通訊傳輸亦會由於天候或其他原因斷訊，需人為啟動連線。以上狀況有時會造成監測設備運轉中斷，甚至損壞，需檢修或換新。2.提升監測網完整性、建立偵測網(Sensor Net)即透過遠端數位與影像自動化收集設備，將紫斑蝶越冬棲地的森林、河川、溪流、山岳等地景環境、植物、紫斑蝶與鳥類等生物動態、氣候變化等自然現象與景觀資料，以ADSL傳送至森林數位站的伺服器，經分類、處理後作儲存，供研究與分析。偵測網所使用的自動化資料收集設備包括溫度計、溼度計、日輻射計、風速風向計等，並以遠端遙控攝影機進行紫斑蝶動態影像收集與儲存，供即時線上觀察分析。94、95年度已建立完成棲地一之5個完整的監測站，以及棲地二之2個監測點。本年度預定將建立棲地二中一個完整的監測站，即包括氣象監測設備與攝影機影像監測設備。3.相關先進數位技術及整合運用概述本計畫將整合運用自動監測、ADSL寬頻傳輸、多媒體影像資料庫等技術。本計畫將分別探討這些技術的優點、成本效益考量，整合運用的關鍵技術，並進行實際的最佳化整合運用。4.「紫斑蝶棲地保育自動化監測網站系統」整體規劃本計畫將以自動化生態監測技術建立生態監測網，亦即建立一分散式資料服務架構，各地之使用者可透過網際網路連線，經權限核可後使用資料庫及網站服務。 本計畫之生態監測網之功能，在於使用者可以在任意網址透過網路，取得遠端偵測網上任何偵測站的數據與影像資料，而不需了解各偵測站資料的格式、使用的資料庫管理軟體等。工作項目包括：(1) 撰寫及修改各伺服器的軟硬體規格和需要增加的程式控制功能(2) 修改資料和影像傳輸通路的設計標準與涵式呼叫方式。(3) 計算各伺服器間的網際網路頻寬需求(4) 修改設計監測數據與影像資料的儲存邏輯(5) 提出資料庫負載平衡與備援資料庫設計5.「紫斑蝶棲地保育自動化生態監測系統網站」之發展、擴充及維護本計畫將以Web技術，建立一集中單一窗口之入口網站(Portal)，各地的使用者可透過網際網路連接，通過適當的權限控管機制後，可使用入口網站所建立之監測網服務，包括監看偵測網中各遠端測站的數據及影像資料，或取得經彚整分析之資料等服務。工作項目包括：(1) 擴充及維護入口網站，內容包括：A. 新增監測目標及元有監測點的個別影像與數據資料a. 二個紫斑蝶越冬棲地現場測站的溫濕度、影像資料b. 林試所六龜研究中心現有的氣象測站資料，包括溫濕度、風速風向、日照、雨量等B. 新增監測目標及原有監測點的彙整影像與數據資料C. 分析及研究的經過與成果D. 為研究所收集的相關資料(2) 修正及建置影像監測、擷取、紀錄、儲存與查詢系統雛型(3) 整合新、舊紫斑蝶越冬棲地環境數據、紫斑蝶活動影像之網頁呈現畫面(4) 協助林試所及六龜地區申請與處理網路連接與寬頻問題6. 撰寫本計畫期中、期末及研究報告。溫溼度計設置高度方位每秒收集資料一次日輻射計風速計風向計環場攝影機

Effects of forest tending management strategies on carbon storage(2/3)

The purpose of this study is to explore the biomass and carbon storage of Taiwan cypress (Chameacyparis formosensis) and Taiwania trees (Taiwania cryptomerioides) grown with different silvicultural treatments in built permanent plots. The growth characteristics and mortality of trees from plots are investigated. Fifty sample trees are felled for stem analysis and surveying biomass for each species. The DBH, tree height, volume and biomass of stem, branch, and leaf of sampled trees are measured and investigated. Moreover, an increment borer was used to cut cores from trees. The bulk density and ring characteristics of sampled cores are investigated by time sequence method and soft x-ray densitometer techniques. The biomass and carbon storage are calculated from the tree growth and ring density characteristics. The applicable forest management could be analyzed and decided by evaluating the biomass and carbon storage of Taiwan cypress and Taiwania trees grown in different silvicultural regimes. The appropriate strategies of management that include thinning stand age, stand density, thinning time, interval of thinning treatments, utilization of thinned wood, and rotation, etc. are very important and assessed.
Chih-MingChiuTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteDivision of Forest Managementcmchiu@tfri.gov.tw

林分生長及各項性狀調查求取單木胸徑、樹高、斷面積、材積、枯死情況，換算單位面積之平均胸徑、樹高、材積及枯死株數。樹幹解析及生物量調查依徑級分布，砍伐台灣杉及紅檜各50株，共100株進行分析，求出胸徑、材積與幹、枝、葉各部分生物量之關係。比重之測定1.毎一不同處理樣區，以生長錐直徑10.0㎜及4.5㎜，每一樣木分別鑽取木軸二條，10.0㎜木軸部分進行絕乾比重及含水率測定後再進行碳轉換係數之測定，另一4.5㎜木軸進行X-ray掃描分析。2.每一不同處理樣區，預定鑽取樣區株數之1/10，再一樣區至少5株做為該處樣區之比重。3.不同處理之生長與比重隨林齡變化之關係，使用soft-X-ray掃描分析儀（Tree Ring X-ray Scanner, Model QTRS-01X 美製），其將soft-X-ray和微密度計整合掃描，搭配電腦及軟體，可解析樹木年輪構造及密度8個特徵值之連續變異。碳含量之測定碳含量之測定，則以元素分析儀（Elementar Analysen-systeme, Hamburg, Germany）測定樣品的碳含量組成百分比。木材試料先依年輪別，研磨成細粒粉末後(通過mesh no,80)，取2-4mg經絕乾後之試材粉末裝入該儀器專用錫盒內，再放入儀器中進行測定。資料分析本計劃生物量之測定，以地上部為主，再依相依相關係數轉換為全株材數，由上述所求得之資料分別以單木及林分進行統計分析，以探求不同經營策略，單木及林分生長、枯死、比重及碳含量係數隨時空之變化，並將轉換為生物量及碳含量，以求出此二樹種最佳經營之碳吸存量。

低溫保存對台灣紅豆杉莖芽存活、生長與紫杉烷類含量的影響--低溫保存對台灣紅豆杉莖芽存活、生長

台灣紅豆杉莖芽以4℃及12℃低溫保存3mo，再恢復於正常培養室培養1.5mo以探討莖芽長度、繼代培養後莖芽置入低溫前之預培養時間、培養基組成與光照條件對莖芽存活的影響。結果以1.5 cm之莖芽，在正常培養室預培養2 wk，培養基為MS添加10 M ABA的低溫保存芽體存活率最高。該處理在不同低溫、黑暗或低光照的環境，均可獲得97%以上的存活率。延長莖芽在12℃低溫保存時間到0.5、1、1.5與2yr後的莖芽存活率分別為97、90、87與72%；在4℃則為95、75、72、59%。低溫保存後存活之莖芽雖然有褐化與壞死現象，但仍能會恢復正常生長。比較低溫保存2yr之莖芽與正常繼代培養莖芽生產紫杉烷類之濃度，發現兩者沒有差異。建議最佳低溫保存方式是12℃黑暗下1.5 yr，此條件下莖芽可以達到87%的存活率。
蔡錦瑩林業試驗所北市南海路53號02-23039978#201302-23374766tsay@tfri.gov.tw

何政坤林業試驗所北市南海路53號02-23039978#200202-23374766kho@tfri.gov.tw研究員

培植體長度對低溫保存芽體存活的影響將試管苗的莖芽切成1,1.5,2.5,3.5cm長度，培養於添加10MABA(abscisicacid)之M培養基(簡稱MA培養基)，置於25℃培養室培養2wk後，再移於相同光照條件之4°與12℃培養室低溫保存3mo。取出莖芽培養於新鮮的M培養基，置於25℃培養室培養1.5 mo使芽體恢復正常生長後，調查莖芽存活率以測定最適低溫保存的莖芽長度。預培養(preculture)對莖芽存活的影響切取試管苗1.5cm長之莖芽，培養於MA培養基，置於25℃培養室培養0-3wk後，再置於相同光照條件之4°與12℃低溫培養室保存3 mo。同方法一，將莖芽取出經繼代培養在M培養基1.5 mo後，調查莖芽存活率以測定最適的預處理時間。培養基組成對莖芽存活與再生長的影響切取台灣紅豆杉試管苗1.5 cm長之莖芽，培養於M培養基添加不同濃度之ABA (10, 50, 100 M) 或mannitol (0.05, 0.1, 0.5,1M)，先培養在25℃培養室2wk後，再置於相同光照條件之4°與12℃培養室保存3mo。將莖芽取出並繼代培養於M培養基，置於25℃培養室1.5mo後，調查莖芽存活率。存活莖芽再經一次繼代培養1.5mo後(即低溫取出後在25℃培養室培養3 mo)，調查莖芽長度。光照與黑暗保存對莖芽存活的影響切取1.5cm長莖芽培養於MA培養基，將莖芽先於25℃培養2wk後，再置於黑暗或40與70E.m-2s-1光照強度之4°與12℃培養室保存3 mo。同方法二，將莖芽經繼代培養，1.5 mo後調查莖芽存活率。長期低溫保存對莖芽存活與再生長的影響台灣紅豆杉莖芽切成1.5cm長，置於MA培養基，先於25℃培養2wk後，再置於黑暗或40Em-2s-1光照強度之4°與12℃培養室，保存3-24 mo。同方法四取出芽體繼代培養1.5 mo後，先調查記錄莖芽存活率，3 mo後調查莖芽生長情形。

培植體長度對低溫保存芽體存活的影響將試管苗的莖芽切成1,1.5,2.5,3.5cm長度，培養於添加10MABA(abscisicacid)之M培養基(簡稱MA培養基)，置於25℃培養室培養2wk後，再移於相同光照條件之4°與12℃培養室低溫保存3mo。取出莖芽培養於新鮮的M培養基，置於25℃培養室培養1.5 mo使芽體恢復正常生長後，調查莖芽存活率以測定最適低溫保存的莖芽長度。預培養(preculture)對莖芽存活的影響切取試管苗1.5cm長之莖芽，培養於MA培養基，置於25℃培養室培養0-3wk後，再置於相同光照條件之4°與12℃低溫培養室保存3 mo。同方法一，將莖芽取出經繼代培養在M培養基1.5 mo後，調查莖芽存活率以測定最適的預處理時間。培養基組成對莖芽存活與再生長的影響切取台灣紅豆杉試管苗1.5 cm長之莖芽，培養於M培養基添加不同濃度之ABA (10, 50, 100 M) 或mannitol (0.05, 0.1, 0.5,1M)，先培養在25℃培養室2wk後，再置於相同光照條件之4°與12℃培養室保存3mo。將莖芽取出並繼代培養於M培養基，置於25℃培養室1.5mo後，調查莖芽存活率。存活莖芽再經一次繼代培養1.5mo後(即低溫取出後在25℃培養室培養3 mo)，調查莖芽長度。光照與黑暗保存對莖芽存活的影響切取1.5cm長莖芽培養於MA培養基，將莖芽先於25℃培養2wk後，再置於黑暗或40與70E.m-2s-1光照強度之4°與12℃培養室保存3 mo。同方法二，將莖芽經繼代培養，1.5 mo後調查莖芽存活率。長期低溫保存對莖芽存活與再生長的影響台灣紅豆杉莖芽切成1.5cm長，置於MA培養基，先於25℃培養2wk後，再置於黑暗或40Em-2s-1光照強度之4°與12℃培養室，保存3-24 mo。同方法四取出芽體繼代培養1.5 mo後，先調查記錄莖芽存活率，3 mo後調查莖芽生長情形。

A Metadata-Based Framework for Multilingual Ecological Information Management

Herein, we introduce a framework of an ecological information management prototype of tools based on a metadata standard. The framework was developed by the Ecological Informatics Working Group of the Taiwan Forestry Research Institute (TFRI) to aid with editing, storing, and using documents in the multiple languages of Asian cultures that comprise the East-Asia Pacific International Long-Term Ecological Research (EAP-ILTER) Network. The conceptual framework of the system can be divided into three tiers. The first tier deals with datasets and related information. The second tier relates to information management. Once datasets and other related information have been described, they are stored in a schema-independent database. The third tier is comprised of the full web-based interfaces that allow easy access to the second tier. Results of the application of this framework consist of an Ecological Metadata Language (EML) document database module, a data analysis function module, and a collection of 58 EML documents.
Chau ChinLinTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteSenior Scientistchin@tfri.gov.tw

Sheng ShanLuTaiwan Forestry Research InsituteAssociate Scientistsslu@tfri.gov.twPrincipal Investigator

develop a metadata-base framworkThe first step in developing and testing the conceptual framework was to review the resources available in the field of ecoinformatics. After conducting this review, we decided to adopt the systems developed by the National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis (NCEAS) at the University of California, Santa Barbara which include Morpho, Metacat (short for âmetadata catalogâ), and the EML2R from the Processing Techniques for Automated Harmonization (PTAH) project at the University of Virginia. Jointly these provide the tools for creating, editing, storing, retrieving, and using EML documents. Then Morpho and Metacat were modified to resolve language coding issues in Asian countries including China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Mongolia, the Philippines, Taiwan, and Thailand. Finally, the system was tested through workshops held domestically and internationally.
A test of the suitability of the system for multiple languages was conducted through 10 domestic workshops and two international workshops held from 2004 to 2006

台灣杉人工林內已更新闊葉樹之經營策略

依據現場作業經驗，台灣杉人工造林地進入期中撫育階段(15~20年生，平均DBH約20cm )時，林下經常已有闊葉樹天然更新幼樹之出現。這些珍貴的原生闊葉樹種，正是目前生態系經營行動中的重要復育對象，如能配合恰當的期中撫育及相關育林作業，理應成為台灣杉人工造林地後續經營之重要資產。傳統之人工造林地期中撫育作業，多將其重點置於造林木之生長促進與形質改善，直到最近，方將研究及作業重點，擴及疏伐與修枝作業對生物多樣性與水土保持之影響，至於前項已天然更新闊葉樹資產之經營策略，則仍付闕如。本研究之目的乃針對此一珍貴資產進行經營策略規畫及現地驗證，除對台灣杉人工造林地內經由天然更新途徑發生之闊葉樹植群進行解析之外，亦將就不同型態與強度之期中撫育作業，對天然更新幼樹之影響進行監測，期能找出恰當的作業時機與作業模式，並擬訂台灣杉人工造林地已更新闊葉樹之經營策略。

Content: 試驗地設置本研究採單因子試驗設計，處理為台灣杉造林木之伐採強度，以樣區調查之平均值為準，共進行三種處理：留存二分之一胸高斷面積、留存四分之一胸高斷面積，以及不伐採，試區採逢機區集排列，作業樣區面積為50×50㎡。本研究採單因子試驗設計，處理為台灣杉造林木之伐採強度，以樣區調查之平均值為準，共進行三種處理：留存二分之一胸高斷面積、留存四分之一胸高斷面積，以及不伐採，試區採逢機區集排列，作業樣區面積為50×50㎡。植被及上木之每木調查作業樣區選定後，於其中心位置畫定20×25㎡之調查樣區進行植被及上木之每木調查，並於調查完成後，開始進行撫育伐採作業。作業樣區選定後，於其中心位置畫定20×25㎡之調查樣區進行植被及上木之每木調查，並於調查完成後，開始進行撫育伐採作業。長期監測樣區之設置於伐採作業完成後，於調查樣區之中心位置設置監測樣區，進行植被與生育地因子之監測。於伐採作業完成後，於調查樣區之中心位置設置監測樣區，進行植被與生育地因子之監測。植群調查及分析本計畫之調查項目，包括台灣杉之胸徑，以及林下更新幼樹之樹種、胸(基)徑，分析與比對之植群介量則包括：重要植指數、多樣性指數、相似性指數等。以樣區調查之平均值為準，共進行三種處理：留存二分之一胸高斷面積、留存四分之一胸高斷面積，以及不伐採，試區採逢機區集排列

紅檜人工林生物量和不同疏伐策略對二氧化碳吸存之效應

本報告探討台灣紅檜人工林生長與生物量，砍伐不同徑級3.0-35.0 cm之紅檜人工林，樣木共84株，求出台灣紅檜人工林樹高與胸徑相關曲線或材積式及不同部位幹、枝、葉生物量和胸徑及材積廻歸式V=0.3514(D2H)0.8905，樹幹生物量和材積之轉換係數M=426.16V，求算地上部生物量和材積之生物量擴展係數M=544.85V，並用以估算不同徑級之紅檜材積、生物量與碳吸存量。本試驗並以六龜試驗林不同疏伐策略之人工林為例，進行分析與估算，發現不同疏伐處理及時間系列對木材密度（8個年輪特徵值），除疏伐處理除對LW影響不顯著外，餘特徵值皆有顯著或極顯著之影響，林齡對木材密度之8個年輪特徵值皆有顯著或極顯著之影響，而疏伐對碳含量之影響不明顯，但林齡對碳含量之影響極顯著。紅檜人工林疏伐後經過5、20、25年，林分現存材積均以對照區最多，強度疏伐區最小，但若以材積淨生長量則呈現相反趨勢，顯示適度之疏伐，並將疏伐木搬出利用，可增進林分碳吸存效果。
志明 邱 林業試驗所 研究員兼組長 台北市南海路53號 cmchiu@tfri.gov.tw

Content: 志明 邱 林業試驗所 研究員兼組長 台北市南海路53號 cmchiu@tfri.gov.tw
如需相關資料，請洽作者。
如需相關資料，請洽作者。

試驗地概況 本研究試驗地位於林業試驗所六龜研究中心試驗林第4林班內，海拔高約為1,500 m，試區之年平均溫度為18.6℃，年平均總降雨量為2,280 mm，且多集中於4～9月，年平均相對濕度為81％（TFRI, 1998）。本試驗林分原為天然闊葉樹林，經伐採後於1957年5月間造林，面積約12 ha，每公頃栽植株數為2500株，25年生時，成活率約70％，立木度相當均勻，並進行四種不同程度之下層疏伐，強度疏伐留存胸高斷面積30 m2/ha，中度留存35 m2/ha，弱度40 m2/ha及未疏伐52 m2/ha，並於疏伐後5、20、25年定期進行樣區每木調查，量測胸徑及樹高，每一樣區面積0.05ha，每一處理重複4次。 材積式與生物量 為求材積式與瞭解各徑級生物量與擴展係數之關係，本研究除砍伐林業試驗所六龜試驗林不同疏伐處理樣本外，亦增砍伐北部（棲蘭山）、中部（杉林溪）紅檜人工林，各徑級樣木共84株。配合樹幹解析方式分段，即樹幹基部至0.3 m、1.3 m、3.3 m、5.3 m、7.3 m…至樹梢端，分別量其末口直徑，供樹幹解析，並以Huber區分材積，精確計算立木材積（Philip, 2002）及分段秤樹幹、枝條及葉子鮮重。主幹至頂端褐色梢端處屬樹幹，樹冠褐色部份屬枝條，綠色部份則歸屬葉子部分。待分段秤鮮重後，各分段各取3 cm一圓盤，稱取重量，再攜回實驗室，在烘箱中103 ± 2℃乾燥至恆重，以求算乾鮮比（含水率）轉換各段木之絕乾重量，再彙總為全幹重。而樹冠層則分三等分，各分別取其混合大小枝條樣本500-300g、混合葉子樣本約200 g，經實際秤鮮重後裝袋編號，同樣攜回實驗室以103 ± 2℃烘至絕乾重，求得樣本乾鮮比。供推估該樣木各層枝、葉乾重，將各層枝、葉乾重加總後可得到該樣木枝與葉之總乾重。 木材密度之測定 取六龜試驗地每一不同疏伐度處理樣區，不同疏伐處理取近似平均木4株，共64株，以生長錐每一樣木分別鑽取木軸二條，分別進行容積密度、絕乾比重及含水率測定後再進行碳轉換係數之測定，另一木軸進行X-ray掃描分析。以估算該處理樣區之密度。使用soft-x-ray掃描分析儀（Tree Ring X-ray Scanner, Model QTRS-OIX, 美國QMS製）掃描不同處理之生長錐木軸，可解析樹木年輪構造及密度8個特徵值之連續變異（Parker and Jozsa, 1973），以解析生長和密度之變化。 碳含量之測定 碳含量之測定，取前述之生長錐木軸，先依六龜試驗林不同疏伐處理別、不同年輪位置，研磨成細粒粉末後（＜0.5mm），取2～4mg之試材粉末，裝入儀器專用錫盒內，以乾燒法用元素分析儀（ELEMENTOR vario EL型）測定不同疏伐處理及不同林齡樣品的碳含量（Lin et al., 2003）。 造林地林分碳吸存量之估算 以六龜試驗林50年生紅檜人工林，經過不同撫育疏伐度為例，加以說明，本試驗以歷年實測單木胸徑、樹高資料，以樹幹解析之材積式求得單木材積，再依相關係數轉換為全株生物量，生物量之測定，以地上部為取樣測定及估算，由上述所求得之資料以單木及林分進行統計分析，以探求不同經營策略，單木及林分生長、枯死、密度及碳含量係數隨時空之變化，並將轉換為生物量及碳吸存，以求出紅檜最佳經營策略之碳吸存量。

關刀溪森林生態系牛奶榕物候及性別分化之表現

本研究為探討關刀溪森林生態系雌雄異株牛奶榕之物候適應性表現。牛奶榕每月雌榕果生產與氣候因子中的氣溫、降水、淨輻射等呈顯著相關；雄榕果則與氣候因子無顯著相關。雌、雄株的展葉、落葉時期相近，葉子之發育程度與雌、雄榕果主要花季的養分蓄積方式呈現性別分化。牛奶榕的榕果生產主要集中在春季至秋季，雄族群株間的榕果生產較集中於春季，雌族群株間的花季集中於夏、秋兩季。在單株個體內，雌株株內花期於夏、秋兩季明顯不同步，與氣溫呈顯著相關，而與降水相關不顯著；雄株株內花期不同步波動與氣候因子相關不顯著。關刀溪森林生態系的牛奶榕物候呈現明顯的性別分化，分別適應其生育地的環境變化，有利於牛奶榕與牛奶榕小蜂的共生-授粉生態關係的維持。

Diplazium megaphyllum (Bak.) Christ, A Rare Fern in Taiwan, Survives Through Apogamous Reproduction

The gametophyte morphology and reproductive behavior of Diplazium megaphyllum, a rare fern in Taiwan, were studied. It was triploid (2n = 123) and produced 32-spored sporangia. Spore germination and gametophyte development were of “Vittaria-type” and “Adiantum-type”, respectively. Adult gametophytes were heart-shaped and naked. Both male and female gametophytes appeared in the cultures, but no hermaphroditic ones were found. Antheridia released active sperms, but archegonia did not develop well and lost function. Young sporophytes were produced apogamously, directly from the cells of cushion of ventral surface of gametophytes behind the notch. The first frond of young sporophyte was of midribed type and pinnate.

Diplazium megaphyllum (Bak.) Christ, A Rare Fern in Taiwan, Survives Through Apogamous Reproduction
Diplazium megaphyllum (Bak.) Christ, A Rare Fern in Taiwan, Survives Through Apogamous Reproduction

Diplazium megaphyllum (Bak.) Christ, A Rare Fern in Taiwan, Survives Through Apogamous ReproductionThree sporophytes of Diplazium megaphyllum, locating at Hwalian and Nantou, were transplanted to the fern greenhouse of Taiwan Forestry Research Institute (TFRI) (Table 1). After 3 months culture, root tips of the sporophyte collected from Hwalian were squashed following modified Sharma’s method for somatic chromosome observation (Sharma 1982).To estimate the number of spores per sporangium, fresh fronds with mature sporangia were collected and 10 haphazardly sporangia per sporophyte were sampled. Then these fronds were air dried for 2 days to release spores. The ratio of normal (non-abortive) spores was observed by haphazardly sampling 100 spores from each sporophyte within two days of release. Under the microscope, the sizes (length of long axis) of 100 non-abortive haphazardly selected spores from each plant were measured.Germination rate was determined by sowing spores, on member filters (pore 0.45μm, 47mm in diameter, Gelman Laborator) which laid on the Kingroot medium (vermiculite: peat: perlite = 4:4:2; South Sea Vermiculite and Perlite Co., Taipei, Taiwan). Totally 400 spores, 100 spore/filter, 4 filters per plant, were haphazardly selected to count. All cultures were maintained under white fluorescent illumination of ca. 24 μmole m-2s-1, 12 h/d. Temperature ranged from 20 to 28℃.To observe gametophyte development, spores from different sources were sown on the Kingroot medium directly. The sexual expression, age and size of gametophytes (from 100 haphazardly selected gametophytes per plant) were recorded every 2 weeks. Five antheridium-bearing gametophytes, derived from spores of each sporophyte, were immersed in 70% alcohol for a week. Five antheridia of each gametophyte were sampled, and the sperm numbers per antheridium were counted.The morphology of gametophyte and young sporophyte were all observed under microscopes (Leica, Wild M8; Leitz, Dialux 20), and pictures were taken with the aid of digital camera (Nikon, Coolpix 995).Diplazium megaphyllum TaiwanThree sporophytes of Diplazium megaphyllum, locating at Hwalian and Nantou

土窯燒製柳杉枝梢材木炭之研究

本研究以柳杉人工林枝梢材為原料，利用土窯燒製木炭與收集木醋液之過程中，以K型熱電偶測定土窯內與煙囪口之溫度變化，檢討窯內不同炭化溫度與不同煙囪溫度分別對木炭與木醋液基本性質之影響。 由試驗結果得知，土窯內炭化溫度曲線之變化依各測定點高度而明顯不同，窯內上層之溫度上升較下層者早且快速，窯內炭化溫度達750℃以上，收炭率為29.0%，柳杉木炭之精練度與電阻係數隨炭化溫度之升高而明顯降低，而音速則隨炭化溫度之升高而明顯增大，柳杉木炭之pH為8以上且隨炭化溫度之增加而有略增之趨勢，真密度與比表面積隨炭化溫度升高而增大。柳杉木醋液之收率為13.3％，比重為1.003~1.011，受煙囪溫度升高之影響不明顯，pH為2.48~3.68，隨煙囪溫度之升高而明顯增大，酸度為2.10~4.76%，隨煙囪溫度之升高而增大或减小之趨勢不明顯，焦油率為0.1353~0.3904％受煙囪溫度升高之影響不明顯。

Chromosome Numbers of Five Species of the Marattiaceae in Taiwan

The chromosome numbers of root tips of all 5 species of the Marattiaceae in Taiwan were determined. Results showed that Angiopteris lygodiifolia (2n = 80), Angiopteris palmiformis (2n = 80), and Marattia pellucida (2n = 78) are diploid; Archangiopteris itoi is triploid (2n = 120), and Archangiopteris somai is tetraploid (2n = 160). These chromosome numbers together with previous evidence support the hypothesis that Archangiopteris itoi is a hybrid between Angiopteris lygodiifolia and Archangiopteris somai.

Plant CollectingSixteen plants of 5 species were collected from Taiwan and a nearby island, Lanyu. Those plants were transplanted to the Taipei Botanical Garden.SquashingAfter about 1month of cultivation, the root tips were pretreated for 3~4 h with a mixture of 70 ppm cycloheximide and 250 ppm 8-hydroxyquinoline (1:1) at about 18~20℃. The root tips were fixed for 1~3 h in a mixture of 45%acetic acid and absolute ethanol (1:3) at about 20℃, and then preserved in 70% ethanol at 4℃. Then they were macerated for 1~3 min in 1 N HCl at 60℃, washed for 10 s and digested for 1~2 h in 4% pectinase. Finally, theroot tips were squashed in modified Sharma’s solution (Sharma 1982). The chromosome number of root tip cells was observed with a light microscope (Leitz, Dialux 20) and photographed with a digital camera (Nikon, Coolpix 995).

Chromosome Numbers of Five Species of the Marattiaceae in Taiwan
銀合歡移除及栽植作業對現地保留原生木本植物 之短期影響-以墾丁海岸林復舊地為例

墾丁國家公園內遭外來種銀合歡入侵情形嚴重，急需進行有關銀合歡移除及復舊作業的相關研究。試驗地作業前為農耕地廢棄後遭銀合歡入侵之林地，成(幼)樹(DBH≧1cm)的密度為7,645株/ha，其中銀合歡占72%。試驗地分為12 m與6 m兩種寬度之銀合歡移除帶，移除帶之間有3 m之保留帶，以達遮蔭及防風效果。銀合歡於2008年梅雨季前移除，並於作業前後進行現地保留原生木本植物之調查。結果顯示銀合歡移除及栽植作業不會減少成(幼)樹的密度及物種數，但會降低其樹冠面積，此外10月時冠幅的大幅下降則導因於颱風干擾。相對的，移除作業會明顯降低稚樹(DBH<1 cm，高度≧50 cm)及幼苗(高度<50 cm)的密度及物種數，且12 m移除帶的受害情形多比6 m顯著，密度減少約1/3。整體來說，銀合歡移除作業對幼小木本植物衝擊較大，移除帶越寬植生受到的影響也越大。但本研究結果顯示，多數受擾動的植生可在一個生長季內經由幼苗庫與種子庫等更新材料快速補充恢復，但未來植生更新之速度與方向，則需要進一步的監測研究。

僅供研究人員參考， 若有引用請務必與所有者聯絡。

銀合歡移除作業 銀合歡的移除工作於2008年5月中進行，移除方式為每株離地面10cm以下用鏈鋸切除，切除後的地上部分截成1m以下之長度。殘株分為兩種處理方式：1.樹幹直徑小於3cm者，留置於原地；2.樹幹直徑大於3cm者，將伐除之銀合歡置於保留帶邊緣。移除過程中儘量避免傷及其它保存之原生樹種。為避免銀合歡重新入侵，研究期間(2008年5-10月)共進行二次銀合歡根株萌蘗及幼苗之砍除作業。 試驗設計 本試驗採逢機完全區集設計，共有四個區集，除區集1因地形關係為70m長，其餘區集皆為80m長。區集內銀合歡移除帶分為12m與6m兩種寬度(圖1)，而每個區集內有2條12m及4條6m之移除帶，移除帶內除了將銀合歡移除外，其它樹種全部保留。由於恆春海岸林夏季長且炎熱，加上有海風與冬季落山風之影響，銀合歡全面移除恐不利復舊栽植苗之生長，所以移除帶之間皆有3m之保留帶(銀合歡不移除)，方向約與海岸線垂直，有遮蔭及防風效果。 銀合歡移除後，並在2008年6月之梅雨期間栽植稜果榕(Ficus septica Burm. F)、黃槿(Hibiscus tiliaceus L.)及欖仁(Terminalia catappa L.)等17種恆春半島原生之海岸樹種。栽植行株距以2 m x 1.25 m為原則，各樹種在空間上採隨機混植方式配置。 調查及分析方法 於銀合歡移除作業前(5月)、銀合歡移除及苗木栽植作業後(7月)及生長季末期(10月)各進行乙次植生狀況調查，鑑定並記錄調查區內之各原生木本植物(不包括栽植苗木)種類，並依其大小區分為成(幼)樹(DBH≧1cm)、稚樹(DBH<1cm，高度≧50cm)及幼苗(高度<50cm)等三群，調查方法如下： 1.成(幼)樹及稚樹調查 每個試驗小區皆取一寬2m且平行於保留帶之穿越線，穿越線位於每一移除帶之中間，6m移除帶只取樣北邊的一區。在樣區內調查成(幼)樹(DBH≧1cm)之種類、胸高直徑及樹冠幅，並記錄林下稚樹之種類與株數。 2.幼苗調查 在木本植物穿越帶上，每10公尺取一1m x 1m之調查區，在調查區中記錄木本幼苗之種類和株數。 另外，並以株數分別計算三個不同大小類群(成(幼)樹、稚樹及幼苗)之Shannon-Wiener 指數(H´)，以比較不同處理及各時期多樣性的變化： 此研究各項調查結果使用SAS Enterprise Guide 統計軟體4.1 版混合模型(mixed model)中的重複測量(repeated measures)來執行分析，再以Tukey多重比較方法來比較平均值之差異性。

調查樣區之栽植帶寬度

銀合歡移除作業 銀合歡的移除工作於2008年5月中進行，移除方式為每株離地面10cm以下用鏈鋸切除，切除後的地上部分截成1m以下之長度。殘株分為兩種處理方式：1.樹幹直徑小於3cm者，留置於原地；2.樹幹直徑大於3cm者，將伐除之銀合歡置於保留帶邊緣。移除過程中儘量避免傷及其它保存之原生樹種。為避免銀合歡重新入侵，研究期間(2008年5-10月)共進行二次銀合歡根株萌蘗及幼苗之砍除作業。 試驗設計 本試驗採逢機完全區集設計，共有四個區集，除區集1因地形關係為70m長，其餘區集皆為80m長。區集內銀合歡移除帶分為12m與6m兩種寬度(圖1)，而每個區集內有2條12m及4條6m之移除帶，移除帶內除了將銀合歡移除外，其它樹種全部保留。由於恆春海岸林夏季長且炎熱，加上有海風與冬季落山風之影響，銀合歡全面移除恐不利復舊栽植苗之生長，所以移除帶之間皆有3m之保留帶(銀合歡不移除)，方向約與海岸線垂直，有遮蔭及防風效果。 銀合歡移除後，並在2008年6月之梅雨期間栽植稜果榕(Ficus septica Burm. F)、黃槿(Hibiscus tiliaceus L.)及欖仁(Terminalia catappa L.)等17種恆春半島原生之海岸樹種。栽植行株距以2 m x 1.25 m為原則，各樹種在空間上採隨機混植方式配置。 調查及分析方法 於銀合歡移除作業前(5月)、銀合歡移除及苗木栽植作業後(7月)及生長季末期(10月)各進行乙次植生狀況調查，鑑定並記錄調查區內之各原生木本植物(不包括栽植苗木)種類，並依其大小區分為成(幼)樹(DBH≧1cm)、稚樹(DBH<1cm，高度≧50cm)及幼苗(高度<50cm)等三群，調查方法如下： 1.成(幼)樹及稚樹調查 每個試驗小區皆取一寬2m且平行於保留帶之穿越線，穿越線位於每一移除帶之中間，6m移除帶只取樣北邊的一區。在樣區內調查成(幼)樹(DBH≧1cm)之種類、胸高直徑及樹冠幅，並記錄林下稚樹之種類與株數。 2.幼苗調查 在木本植物穿越帶上，每10公尺取一1m x 1m之調查區，在調查區中記錄木本幼苗之種類和株數。 另外，並以株數分別計算三個不同大小類群(成(幼)樹、稚樹及幼苗)之Shannon-Wiener 指數(H´)，以比較不同處理及各時期多樣性的變化： 此研究各項調查結果使用SAS Enterprise Guide 統計軟體4.1 版混合模型(mixed model)中的重複測量(repeated measures)來執行分析，再以Tukey多重比較方法來比較平均值之差異性。
銀合歡移除及栽植作業對現地保留原生木本植物 之短期影響-以墾丁海岸林復舊地為例

Genetic Variation of Wood Specific Gravity and Tracheid Length of Open-Pollinated Progeny Families in Calocedrus formosana

A test plantation containing 5o wind-pollinated progeny families representing 3 provenances of Taiwan incense cedar (Calocedrus formosana) was established in central Taiwan in 1976. A randomized complete block design was adopted in the field layout with 7-tree linear plots in each of 4 replications and a 2 x 2-m spacing between plants. At a tree age of 27 yr, a 10-mm caliber increment core sample was extracted at breast height in the east cardinal direction from the mid-DBH size tree per plot. Thirty families (out of 50) with 100% survival of trees in each of 4 replications were selected for increment-core extraction. In total, 120 cores (1 core family-1 plot-1 x 30 families x 4 replications) were sampled. From each core, only the 6 outermost growth rings near the bark were used to assess the specific gravity and tracheid length. Variations among provenances and among families within a provenance were analyzed using a general linear model. No significant difference among provenances was found in either trait. Significant variations among families within provenances were detected at the 5% level for specific gravity but not for tracheid length. Tree-to-tree variations in both traits accounted for more than 80% of the total variances. The overall mean values were respectively 0.494 for wood specific gravity and 3.16 mm for tracheid length. The family heritability estimate for tracheid length was 0.296, which was weaker than that for wood specific gravity (0.412). Therefore, different strategies of future selection programs are discussed.
Chih-MingChiuTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteDivision of Forest Management23039978-1314cmchiu@tfri.gov.tw

Experimental standsThe study plantation was located at the Lienhwachih Research Center (23.56Ã¯ÂÂ°N, 120.54Ã¯ÂÂ°E), Taiwan Forestry Research Institute, in central Taiwan at an elevation of 720 m. It was established in April 1976 with 3-0 seedlings grown from seeds collected from each of 50 open-pollinated families representing 3 different provenances. In other words, as shown in Fig. 1, we respectively sampled 25, 14, and 11 families from 3 natural stands which were 4.2 (AÃ¯ÂÂ®B), 28.6 (BÃ¯ÂÂ®C), and 30.5 (AÃ¯ÂÂ®C) km in linear distance separate from each other. Trees were hand-planted at a 2.0 ÃÂ 2.0-m spacing with 4 replications, each containing 50 seven-tree row plots which were arranged in a randomized complete block design. The Lienhwachih Research Center is characterized by a mean annual temperature of 20.8Ã¯ÂÂ°C, a relative humidity of 86%, and an annual precipitation of 2180 mm. The rainy season extends from March to September. This study plantation has received no thinning since its establishment.Speific gravity (SG)In November of 2000 at a tree age of 27 yr, a 10-mm caliber increment core sample was extracted at breast height (130 cm above the ground) in the east cardinal direction from 1 mid-DBH-sized tree per plot. In conifers, the breast height sampling is generally satisfactory for evaluating wood SG and other wood properties of the entire tree. The use of mid-DBH-sized tree for the increment core sampling was because it most closely represents the provenances in a statistical sense. Only 30 families with 100% survival of trees in each of 4 replicates were selected for increment-core extraction. And only the 6 outermost growth rings near the bark of the increment cores were extracted and used to assess the SG and TL. This is generally because increment boring of only the 6 growth rings near the bark not only helps minimize damaging effects on study trees, but also provides sufficient data to assess genetic information on wood SG and other properties.A mixture of 95% ethanol: benzene (1:2 v/v) was used to remove the extractives from the core samples. The SG of the extracted sample was determined by the water displacement method according to Smith.Tracheid lengthAfter the SG determination, each of the same 6 growth rings was cut under a magnifying glass and placed in a test tube for chemical maceration at 40Ã¯ÂÂ°C for about 1 wk. The test tubes contained a mixed solution of 30% H2O2: distilled water: glacial acetic acid (1:4:5 by volume). After maceration, the fibrous tracheids were washed with distilled water, dispersed, and mounted on microscope slides, and finally stained with safranin-o. seventy tracheids from each of early- and late-wood of the a growth ring were measured with an ampliscope and averaged to represent the mean value for that ring. All 6 outermost growth rings were used as an experimental unit to report the open-pollinated family values. In total, 120 cores (1 core family-1 plot-1 x 30 families x 4 replications) were analyzed.

棲蘭山柳杉人工林社會效益及決策策略之探討(2/4)

本計劃於96年上半年之研究進度是以行政院退除役官兵輔導委員會森林保育事業管理處之棲蘭山柳杉人工林為對象，進行行列疏伐作業之伐木造材、集運作業之工作研究，探討各作業單元之作業時間及分配比例，其中伐木造材作業平均每株樹之作業時間為358.2sec，實際作業佔整體之工作時間比例為79.5%，集材作業平均每迴次作業時間為952.9sec，實際作業佔整體之工作時間比例為54.4%；另日平均工作量為伐木造材作業平均每組鏈鋸為13.8 m3，日平均集材材積為11.80 m3。 並進而以廻歸分析推估集運作業之作業時間模式。 另外借由「不連續差數重要度指數原則」得知影響伐木造材、集運作業各因子之相對權重（重要度），其中伐木造材以「林地坡度」之重要度最高，集材作業則以「集運材積」最高，並從而推得日標準工作量之計算

作業成本項目之選定列舉出在施業中可能發生之固定、變動成本之項目，以為成本分析之基礎。試區基本資料之蒐集對於可能影響作業效率之因子如林地坡度、林木徑級、蓄積量等進行調查。工作研究將劃分好之工作項目以碼錶並配合攝影機進行時間之量測，並同時記錄其工作量，以了解其作業效率。建立作業時間之模式探討影響作業時間之因子，並建立其模式。重要度分析依「不連續差數重要度指數原則」算出各影響因子之重要度。標準工作量依重要度分析所得之結果及寬裕率計算標準工作量。作業成本之估算依成本分類之項目如直接工資、油料消耗、機器折舊等計算出不同作業模式之作業成本。歷史回顧法蒐集柳杉既有的書刊、專論、研究報告、新聞報導、檔案與統計年報，資料來源務求以一手資料為主，並透過不同素材的反覆比對確認資料的可靠性。此法可瞭解柳杉擴大栽植的決策因素以及外銷對象、數量與價格，以重塑柳杉的重要性消長的過程。

Effect of the Chemical Treatment on the Carbon Fixation of Wood

The objective of this study was to evaluate the effect of the chemical treatment on the carbon fixation of wood, including ammoniacal copper quats (ACQ) and Dricon. Tested specimens were respectively impregnated with ACQ solution at 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6% w/w and with Dricon at 1, 2, 4, 6, 12% w/w. Fungal decay resistance and fire retardancy of the treated wood were evaluated according to ASTM standard showed less weight loss than the threshold retention of 2% and were also effective in resisting attack by brown fungus-Gloeophyllum trabeum. However, the threshold retention for weight loss of 2% against whiteD1413-99 (1999), thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC). Results revealed that wood specimens of Cunninghamia lanceolata and Cryptomeria japonica with 0.5% ACQ fungus-Trametes versicolor was observed when Liquidambar formosana wood treated with 2% of ACQ. The effects of the increase in carbon retention and the reduction in the retention of carbon dioxide release in wood were significantly improved by treating with ACQ. The reaction mechanism of burning changed, when Cunninghamia lanceolata, Cryptomeria japonica and Liquidambar formosana were treated with Dricon, and better results in carbon retention and the reduction in the release retention of carbon dioxide for Dricon-treated wood were observed when treated with higher concentrations of chemicals.

藥劑配製依有效重量成分百分比(% w/w)，將ACQ與Dricon分別調配成0.5、1、2、4、6%及1、2、4、6、12%等不同濃度之水溶液備用。試材藥劑處理試材以60℃烘箱乾燥48 h後，取出並放置於乾燥器中冷卻30 min，再置於天秤上稱重(W1)。(2)將試材置於具減壓裝置之乾燥器中，減壓抽真空至650 mm-Hg，再將各種不同濃度之ACQ、Dricon，分別注入乾燥器中，使木材完全沒入於藥液中，於真空狀態下保持30min，再緩緩回復至常壓。取出處理材，以60℃烘箱乾燥48 h，取出並放置於乾燥器中冷卻30 min，再置於天秤上稱重(W2)。(3)含浸過程中之藥劑留存率.)耐腐朽性試驗依照美國材料試驗協會ASTM D1413-99 (1999)標準方法進行室內實木塊耐腐朽性之評估。處理材經接菌及培養12 wk後，計算各種處理材之重量損失率(weight loss, WL, %)，以評估其耐腐朽性之優劣，並以試驗後處理材重量損失率達2%以下時之藥劑留存率定義為有效門檻(threshold retention)，做為評估防腐藥劑之功效。燃燒性試驗採用瑞士Mettler-Toledo GmbH 公司生產之TGA-851型熱重量分析儀(thermogravimetric analysis)進行TGA試驗，試驗條件為加熱速度10℃/min，加熱溫度由室溫升至600℃，加熱槽中流動氣體分為氮氣與空氣2組，紀錄6 mg之100 mesh處理材之木粉於加熱期間之重量分佈曲線與微分熱重量分佈曲線。另以DSC-822e型熱示差掃瞄卡量儀(differential scanning calorimetry)進行DSC試驗，試驗條件為加熱速度為10℃/min，加熱溫度由室溫升至600℃，加熱槽中流動氣體為空氣，紀錄3 mg之100 mesh處理材木粉於加熱期間之熱示差分佈曲線，並以積分軟體計算其釋放之熱焓值(△H，enthalpy)。TGA, DSC

扇平園區竹園水塔蛙類聲景錄音檔

本資料集所描述的是智慧生態計畫－生態及生物多樣性資訊基礎建設與應用計畫於本所六龜研究中心扇平園區的竹園水塔所設置的固定式錄音設備，目的在於長期監測蛙類聲景變化。本觀測點為全天候24小時待命，每15分鐘錄音2分鐘。所有的錄音資料，均可於生態感測資料展示平台（http://iesn.tfri.gov.tw）上查閱，並以開放資料形式提供生態感測開放資料平台(http://iesn.tfri.gov.tw/forestDW/OpenData)作為資料來源之一。

Butterfly fauna survey of Taimali area

This study focuses on the butterfly fauna of Taimali. The butterfly fauna of Taimali was investigated by transect count monthly in 2005. There were 127 species recorded. The results of this study can serve as a reference for habitat management and species conservation.

Evaluation of antioxidant activity of Calocedrus macrolepis var. formosana leaf extract

Targets of this study are to extract the leaf extracts from six sources of C. macrolepis var. formosana, to evaluate the antioxidant activity of these extracts, and to screen the active fraction from the leaf extract. Results indicated that leaf extracts from six sources posessed good antioxidant activity. The best IC50 value for scavenging DPPH radical of the leaf extract from limonene type was 23.8 ug/mL. Leaf extract was separated into four fractions by liquid-liquid partition. Among them, the ethyl acetate-soluble fraction showed the best antioxidant activity. Based on the above results, leaf extract of C. macrolepis var. formosana is a potential source of natural antioxidants. In addition, results from the antioxidant activity of leaf extracts may provide a helpful reference for breeding fine C. macrolepis var. formosana cultivars.

試驗材料 試驗材料為嫁接過後的台灣肖楠，來源共有6個，分別為2號(八仙山90林班)，7號(八仙山85林班)，18與19號(八仙山110林班)和27、28號(南投中寮)。採取新鮮葉子後冷藏供應後續乙醇抽出物之萃取 抽出物之萃取 將試驗材料於室溫下，用95%乙醇浸泡萃取七天，浸泡後之萃取液用濾紙過濾去除雜質，後經減壓濃縮放入真空乾燥箱乾燥二十四小時。 DPPH自由基清除能力之測定 將450 uL的Tris-HCl buffer(50 mM, pH 7.4)和50 uL 最終濃度為5, 10, 25, 50 及100 ug/mL的試樣混合均勻，再加入1000 uL之0.1 mM的DPPH-ethanol容易混合均勻，於室溫下，避光靜置三十分鐘後，測定517 nm的吸收值。

Portulaca psammotropha Hance (Portulacaceae), a Neglected Species in the Flora of Taiwan and the Philippines

A neglected species in the Flora of Taiwan and the Philippines (the Batan islets), Portulaca psammotropha Hance, is described and illustrated. Herein, Portulaca quadrifida var. formosana and P. insularis are treated as synonym of P. psammotropha. This species is a typical littoral plant that is scattered on coral sands and coral reef in the archipelago around SE China. It can be characterized by leaves alternate; leaf blade quite fleshy, oblong to obovate-oblong, 3-10 mm long, apex obtuse; petals 5, yellowish, ca. 3-5 mm long. The stamen number and stigma lobes of this species vary among the populations observed.

Portulaca psammotropha Hance (Portulacaceae), a Neglected Species in the Flora of Taiwan and the Philippines
Cloning and transfer of the 4-coumarate:CoA ligase (4CL1) gene in Eucalyptus camaldulensis (3/4)

This project is proposed to produce transgenic Eucalyptus camaldulensis with characteristics of low lignin and high cellulose contents. In the last two years, the 4CL1 gene was successfully cloned from xylem tissues of E. camaldulensis by using RT-PCR technique. After sequencing and recognizing the correction of cDNA sequences, the gene was ligated in an antisense orientation onto the plasmid pBI121 to instead of the GUS gene, in which the CaMV 35S promoter had also been replaced with a xylem specific promoter. This reconstructed plasmid was then transferred into a binary strain of Agrobacterium tumefaciens. Transformation of the antisense Euc4CL1 gene was accomplished by co-cultivating the leaf pieces of E. camaldulensis with the Agrobacterium strain. Putative transformed callus was induced and primarily verified by PCR. Southern hybridization was used to confirm the existence of the recombinant gene in transgenic shoots regenerated from the putative transformed callus. In this third year, transgenic shoots will be rooted to produce in vitro plantlets, which will be readily moved to an isolated greenhouse through acclimation and hardening processes. These transgenic plants will be harvested when they are 4 month old. Lignin and cellulose contents will be measured.

Raising transgenic Eucalyptus camaldulensis plants harboring the antisense Euc4CL1 transgeneTo proceed with the progress in the last year, transgenic shoots that have been verified by Southern hybridization will be rooted to produce in vitro plantlets and readily moved to an isolated greenhouse through acclimation and hardening processes.Greenhouse testTransgenic plants will be harvested when they are 4 months old. Polymerase chain reaction coupled with northern or western hybridization will be used to detect the existence and expressional stability of the transgene. Lignin and cellulose content will be determined for transgenic and control plants.Establishment of an isolated filed testAfter obtaining permission, the transgenic plants that have been prescreened in the greenhouse test with better reduction in lignin content and promotion in cellulose accumulation will be duplicated and out-planted to the isolated filed. In the following year, these out-planted trees will be measured for their growth performance, genetic characteristics and pulping properties.

Cytotoxic Constituents from the Leaves of Cinnamomum subavenium

Two new butanolides, subamolide D (1) and subamolide E (2), and a new secobutanolide, secosubamolide A (3), along with 21 known compounds were isolated from the leaves of Cinnamomum subavenium. The structures of 1—3 were determined by spectroscopic analysis. Propidium iodide staining and cytometry analysis were used to evaluate the cell cycle progression of the treated SW480 cells and it was found that 1 and 2 caused DNA damage in a dose- and time-dependent manner.

ExperimentalMelting points were determined using a Yanagimoto micro-melting point apparatus and are uncorrected. Optical rotations were measured with a JASCO DIP-370 digital polarimeter. UV spectra were obtained in MeCN using a JASCO V-530 spectrophotometer. The IR spectra were measured on a Hitachi 260-30 spectrophotometer. 1H (400 MHz, using CDCl3 as solvent for measurement), 13C (100 MHz), DEPT, HETCOR, COSY, NOESY, and HMBC NMR spectra were obtained on a Unity Plus Varian NMR spectrometer. LR-FAB-MS and LR-EI-MS were obtained with a JEOL JMS-SX/SX 102A mass spectrometer or a Quattro GC-MS spectrometer with a direct inlet system. HR-FAB-MS and HR-EI-MS were measured on a JEOL JMSHX 110 mass spectrometer. Silica gel 60 (Merck, 230—400 mesh) was usedfor column chromatography. Precoated silica gel plates (Merck, Kieselgel 60 F-254, 0.20 mm) were used for analytical TLC, and precoated silica gel plates (Merck, Kieselgel 60 F-254, 0.50 mm) were used for preparative TLC.Spots were detected by spraying with 50% H2SO4 and then heating on a hot plate. Flow cytometry analysis was performed using a Becton-Dickinson FACS-Calibur flow cytometer. The DNA labeling dye, propidium iodide (PI), was used to determine DNA damage and the cell cycle progression.28,29) Data is presented as meansstandard deviation (S.D.) and analyzed using one-way ANOVA with Scheffe’s test. A p value of less than 0.05 was consideredas statistically significant.Plant MaterialThe leaves of C. subavenium were collected from Wulai Hsiang, Taipei County, Taiwan in May, 2005. A voucher specimen (Cinnamo. 5) was characterized by one of the authors (Y.-R.H.) and deposited in the Basic Medical Science Education Center, Fooyin University, Kaohsiung County, Taiwan.Extraction and IsolationThe air-dried leaves of C. subavenium (11.0 kg) were extracted with MeOH (50 l_6) at room temperature and a MeOH extract (326.5 g) was obtained upon concentration under reduced pressure. The MeOH extract, suspended in H2O (1 l), was partitioned with CHCl3 (2 l_5) to give fractions soluble in CHCl3 (198.5 g) and H2O (101.2 g). The CHCl3-soluble fraction (198.5 g) was chromatographed over silica gel (800 g, 70—230 mesh) using n-hexane/EtOAc/MeOH mixtures as eluents to produce five fractions. Part of fraction 1 (9.33 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography by eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (20 : 1), enriched with EtOAc to furnish five fractions (1-1—1-5). Fraction 1-1 (7.02 g) was subjected to further silica gel chromatography, eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (100 : 1) and enriched gradually with EtOAc, to obtain three fractions (1-1-1—1-1-3). Fraction 1-1-1 (2.41 g) was further purified by passage over another silica gel column using n-hexane/EtOAc mixtures to obtain stearic acid (42 mg), palmitic acid (57 mg), squalene (23 mg), aristophyll-C (25 mg), and pheophytin-a (10 mg). Fraction 1-1-2 (1.64 g), eluted with n-hexane–EtOAc (30 : 1), was further separated using silica gel column chromatography and preparative TLC (n-hexane–EtOAc (30 : 1) and gave linderanolide B (32 mg) and isolinderanolide B (45 mg). Fraction 1-1-3 (1.11 g) was subjected to silica gel column chromatography and purified by preparative TLC (thin layer chromatography) to yield p-hydroxybenzoic acid (15 mg), p-hydroxybenzaldehyde (19 mg), syringic acid (4 mg), vanillin (12 mg), and vanillic acid (19 mg). Fraction 1-2 (3.02 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography, eluted with n-hexane–EtOAc (50 : 1) and enriched gradually with EtOAc, to obtain three fractions (1-2-1—1-2-3). Fraction 1-2-2 (2.26 g), eluted with nhexane–EtOAc (40 : 1), was further separated using silica gel column chromatography and preparative TLC (n-hexane–EtOAc (30 : 1) and gave submolide D (1) (34 mg), submolide E (2) (51 mg) and secosubamolide A (3) (12 mg). Part of fraction 2 (8.11 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography by eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (10 : 1), then enriched gradually with EtOAc to furnish five fractions (2-1—2-5). Fraction 2-1 (2.02 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography, eluting with CHCl3–MeOH (100 : 1), and enriched gradually with MeOH, to obtain five fractions (2-1-1—2-1-5). Fractions 2-1-1 (0.31 g) and 2-1-2 (0.24 g) were subjected to further silica gel column chromatography and purified by preparative TLC (thin layer chromatography) to yield eugenol (24 mg), and a mixture of ficaprenol-10 and ficaprenol-11 (48 mg). Fraction 2-4 (1.21 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography, eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (40 : 1), and enriched gradually with EtOAc to obtain five fractions (2-4-1—2-4-5). Fraction 2-4-3 (1.31 g), eluted with n-hexane–EtOAc (10 : 1), was further separated using silica gel column chromatography and preparative TLC (n-hexane–EtOAc (20 : 1) and gave caryophyllene (57 mg). Fraction 2-5 (6.03 g, nhexane–EtOAc (10 : 1) was purified by passage over a silica gel column (400 g, 230—400 mesh), using CHCl3/MeOH, to obtain a mixture of b-sitosterol and stigmasterol (1.34 g). Part of fraction 3 (7.21 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography by eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (1 : 1) and enriched gradually with EtOAc, to furnish five fractions (3-1—3-5). Part of fraction 4 (2.42 g) was subjected to silica gel chromatography by eluting with n-hexane–EtOAc (1 : 5), enriched with EtOAc to furnish five further fractions (4-1—4-5). Fraction 4-2 (1.62 g) was purified on a silica gel column (200 g, 230—400 mesh) using CHCl3/MeOH mixtures to obtain (_)-abscisic acid (21 mg). A mixture of b-sitosteryl-D-glucoside and stigmasteryl-D-glucoside (50 mg) was recrystallized (MeOH) from fraction 5. Theknown compounds have been characterized by comparison of their spectroscopicdata with literature values.Cell Culture and Drug TreatmentThe human colon cancer cell line (SW480) was obtained from the American Type Culture Collection (Rockville, MD, U.S.A.). The SW480 cells were cultured in DMEM supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 units/ml penicillin G and 100m g/ml streptomycin at 37 °C in a 5% CO2 humidified atmosphere. Stock solutions of 1 and 2 (100mM) were dissolved in DMSO and various concentrations were prepared in DMEM basal medium with a final DMSO concentration of 0.1%.Cell Cycle AnalysisFor determination of cell cycle progression, the cells were analyzed by flow cytometry.28,29) The colon cells were seeded at a density of 5105 per 60-mm tissue-culture dish. Culture medium was replenished when cells were 80% confluent. Monolayers were treated with various concentrations—of 1 and 2 for 24 h. At the end of treatment, adherent and floating cells were collected, washed twice with PBS, then fixed with PBS–methanol (1 : 2, volume/volume) solution, and stored at 4 °C for at least 18 h. After centrifugation, cell pellets were stained with PBS containing 50m g/ml propidium iodide (PI), and 50m g/ml DNase-free RNaseA for 30 min at room temperature in the dark. The samples were analyzed in a Becton-Dickinson system of FACS-Calibur flow cytometer by using CellQuest software. The percentage of cell cycle phases (G0/G1, S, and G2/M) was quantified using a ModFit LT software (BD Biosciences).

Soil infiltration and runoff path on afforestation of plain areas at Pingtung of southern Taiwan

Soil infiltration was one of important factors in affecting soil and water losses. If soil infiltration on hillslope was large, the rainfall excess would be small. Then surface runoff and soil loss of slopeland would be also small. This study used pond-type infiltrometer to perform measuring infiltration rates on forest plantation and neighboring orchard and grass lands at Shihlin and Linhou farming land of Chaochou area, Pingtung County of southern Taiwan. The final infiltration rates of topsoil at different land uses were as follows: forest plantation (103.7 mm/h), grass land (56.1 mm/h), and orchard (42.0 mm/h). The final infiltration rates of subsoil at different land uses were as follows:forest plantation (9.9 mm/h), grass land (13.3 mm/h), and orchard (6.9 mm/h). Final soil infiltration rates were decreasing from topsoil to subsoil. The final infiltration rate of topsoil at forest plantation was smaller than rainfall intensity (103.8 mm/h) of 50 recurrence years at Pingtung, so no Horton's overland flow happened to forest plantation every 50 recurrence years. However, the final infiltration rate of subsoil at forest plantation was smaller than rainfall intensity (53.2 mm/h) of 1 recurrence year at Pingtung, so saturation overland flow happened to forest plantation every recurrence year. The final infiltration rate of topsoil at grass land was smaller than rainfall intesity (62.2 mm/h) of 2 recurrence years at Pingtung, so Horton's overland flow happened to grass land every 2 recurrence years. The final infiltration rate of topsoil at orchard land was smaller rainfall intensity of 1 recurrence year at Pingtung, so Horton's overland flow happened to orchard land every recurrence year. The final infiltration rates of subsoil at orchard and grass lands were smaller than rainfall intensity of 1 recurrence year at Pingtung, so saturation overland flow happened to orchard and grass lands every year.

This study employs an experiment investigating cognitive mapping of fifth grade children living in a remote village environment, wherein characteristics of the landscape included paths, landmarks, nodes, edges, and districts. Two aspects of analysis were salient in this study. First, important landscape characteristics and their frequency of appearance in the cognitive maps were tabulated and illustrated as a layout map. Second, inaccurate cognitive maps were structurally analyzed to account for any incompleteness, distortions, and augmentation of actual environments found in some map samples. Focus on gender differences in children’s environmental cognition in terms of symbolic representation skills utilized in cognitive mapping is of special interest in this case study. Results confirm Piaget’s theory that older children, aged ten or more, begin to use projective and Euclidean concepts. Furthermore, boys used a greater variety of symbols to represent a particular landscape characteristic, a cultural temple, than did the girls. Finally, we hypothesize that the ‘hunter-gatherer’ social divisions of labor between men and women in the village’s early historical social structure, is consequentially related to gender discrepancies in cognitive mapping symbolic representation skills, in non-English speaking children.

桂竹林之生長特性與崩塌擴張潛勢之探討

本研究探討桂竹生長特性、根系剖面、根力行為以及桂竹林之崩塌原因。研究顯示桂竹屬地下莖密度高，主要分布於土層 0-30 cm深度處，大多成純林之林相，較一般樹林單調且多樣性低。鬚根集中於土層0-60cm深度處，最深約可達70 cm，具有固結土 壤與防止地表沖蝕之功能。在土壤深度60 cm之範圍，依土壤剖面內之根面積比與單根之抗拉強度，可推算桂竹根系所能提供之土壤剪力強度增量值△Sr。同時，此增量值之大小主要視地下莖之數量而定。另外，依據現地試驗結果及觀察資料，可綜合評估桂 竹林地之崩塌特徵、崩塌地擴張潛勢、以及桂竹根系對坡地崩塌之作用與影響。

濕端添加聚電解質複合物於紙張強度與功能開發之研究(1/3)

造紙技術為因應節能省水的大環境需求與壓力，已對留存與濾水助劑的開發有相當的 發展。惟隨著技術的進展，傳統的單劑式添加法已難以適應造紙濕端的需求。目前為 配合次生回收纖維利用的普及與紙機車速加快，已有雙劑與微粒子等添加系統，使濕 端留存與紙力強化功能改善。最新的發展係利用高分子聚電解質電荷相互作用的特性 開發複合體，使之附著於纖維以達更佳的強化效應。本計畫的目的為探索聚電解質複 合體於造紙系統之利用，留存率、濾水性與乾強紙力改善的可能機制及變化添加模式 ，尋求本技術賦予紙張強度與功能性的最適化可行性。本研究應對於依賴大量回收纖 維的我國紙業應有重大參考與改善的價值。三年計畫擬於第一年進行較傳統聚電解質 ，第二年進行特殊聚電解質，如濕強劑之添加，第三年除尋求最適與最經濟之添加法 外，並擬進行於合作紙廠的實作演練，印證試驗室之效果。

Content: Wang Kuo-TsaiDivision of Wood Cellulose,Taiwan Forestry Reasearch Institutereasearch assistant5 3 Nanhai Rd., Taipei 100 , T aiwan.23039978#370323037832ktwang@tfri.gov.tw
Division of Wood Cellulose,Taiwan Forestry Reasearch Institute

本年度重要工作項目及實施方法：1.收集各種具備不同分子量、電荷密度與結構(直鏈與支鏈)等之陰、陽離子性聚電解質，第一年以聚丙烯醯胺(PAM)及澱粉系列為主。分析各製劑於特性濃度之性質(黏度、粒子電荷PCD、zeta電勢等)。另收集兩類回收漿(舊紙箱板漿與舊報紙漿)、漂白闊葉樹原生漿等供試驗之用。2.以各種紙漿分別循環散漿及濾水以收集製備與紙廠白水水質近似之人工白水作為試驗中稀釋漿料之用。3.操作控制組漿料於不同剪力條件下之動態濾水試驗，並抄造手抄紙作為試驗第一次通過留存率、濾液PCD值與紙張性質等比較的基準。4.變化聚電解質對紙漿之添加量與添加方式進行系列試驗。建立單劑添加、序列交互添加雙劑及預製備複合體等方式添加於各漿料，同樣進行動力濾水試驗及抄造手抄紙，分別測定濾水性及紙張性質。部份漿料並保留作下述試驗之用。5.進行依序列添加複層式聚電解質，檢驗多層聚電解質對留存、濾水及紙張性質之影響，建立於紙廠可行之添加模式。6.評估各項添加法對整體造紙系統的影響與效益，確定添加模式與添加量對紙張功能性建立的影響及最適與最具經濟性之添加法。

台東地區相思樹與楓香兩人工林碳累積量

相思樹(Acacia confusa Merr.)和楓香(Liquidamber formosana Hance)為台灣最重要的闊葉樹造林樹種之一。本研究以台東縣約30年生的相思樹和約25年生楓香兩林人工林為對象，伐取樣木，估算其造林木之生物量和生長量，建立根莖比和擴展係數等參數和迴歸式，並估算其碳吸存量和林分碳貯存量。結果顯示，根莖比相思樹為0.296，楓香為0.216，相思樹較高，且與熱帶闊葉林平均值相近。地上部擴展係數相思樹為1.137 Mg m-3，高於楓香的0.855 Mg m-3。兩樹種胸徑生長20年生前楓香生長較快，20年生後相思樹生長較快。地上部生物量連年生長和平均生長皆隨年齡呈上升趨勢，兩曲線尚未相交。相思樹林造林木全株生物量為126.6 Mg ha-1，楓香林造林木則為186.3 Mg ha-1。植體的地上部碳平均濃度，相思樹為48.3%，楓香為48.8%。以此加上粗根碳濃度換算成林分造林木全株碳貯存量，相思樹為60.1 Mg ha-1，低於楓香的90.4 Mg ha-1。以此再換算成林分造林木年平均碳吸存量，相思樹單株碳吸存量為3.50 kg tree-1 yr-1，林分碳吸存量為1.85 Mg ha-1 yr-1；楓香單株碳吸存量為2.78 kg tree-1 yr-1，林分碳吸存量為3.03 Mg ha-1 yr-1。土壤碳貯存量兩林分相近，約為86.0-86.4 Mg ha-1。

樣區調查 選擇林相較完整區域，各設立3個臨時樣區。每樣區面積為0.09 ha (30×30 m)。以胸高直徑（簡稱胸徑）大於10 cm之林木定義為喬木，胸徑1~10 cm之林木為灌木。 於上述之樣區內四個角落各設立5×5 m之小樣區1個。調查其內之灌木及地被植物。 造林木選定與生物量之測定 以樣區造林木資料分析胸徑之分布，將胸徑依5 cm分為一級，相思樹10 cm起至35 cm以上共分6級；楓香以10 cm起至30cm以上共分5級。相思樹大致上依據樣區內各胸徑級株數之比例選取樣木株數，加上考慮粗根生物量和樹幹解析之樣木，每胸徑級內選取1~10株樣木，測定其生物量；楓香屬於私有地，伐木株數受到限制，樣木選取時每胸徑級選取1-2株，在包含平均胸徑之胸徑級則選取6株。各林分喬木伐取樣木之性質和株數如表2。 2006年10至12月間，於此兩林分樣區內分別進行伐木取樣工作，將選定之樣木伐倒後，測定樹高、樹冠幅、活葉高（樹冠底部第一片活葉出現的高度），並以活葉出現位置至樹冠頂端定義為樹冠長。伐倒木的植體區分為樹幹、死枝、葉、小枝條（著葉枝）、大枝條（除著葉枝外之枝條）、附生植物等6部分，分別稱其鮮重。樹幹於樹高1.3 m、樹冠底部及樹冠中央部位各取一約5 cm厚圓盤，稱其鮮重，帶回實驗室後測定其烘乾重 (65℃)。再將樹冠區分為上、下兩層，分別稱取死枝、葉、小枝條、大枝條、附生植物的小樣本(約400 g)，於實驗室中測定其烘乾重。各株樣木皆可由攜回實驗室樣本之烘乾重及其鮮重，推算出各樣本之烘乾重與鮮重比，並由烘乾重與鮮重比分別乘以各植體之鮮重，推算各單株林木之地上部生物量。 地下部生物量只測定粗根部分（直徑≧5 mm），不包含細根部分（直徑<5 mm）。於此兩林分造林木樣木中選取最接近平均胸徑者4株，且其基部1 m半徑範圍無其它喬木存在。每株於測定地上部生物量後，在距基部1 m半徑範圍內之粗根全部挖取。取樣時，由外緣向內小心挖掘，收集粗根，並清除附著的土壤，粗根區分為造林樹種和其它樹種2類，分別稱鮮重。根頭部分取圓盤1個，造林樹種粗根取小樣本(約400 g) 2個，其它樹種粗根取1個小樣本，攜回實驗室。於室內清洗後測定其烘乾重，以烘乾重和鮮重比推算單株林木根生物量及根莖比。 造林木材積及生長量之測定 上述4株平均木除測定粗根生物量外，於樹幹0.3 m、1.3 m處，以及1.3 m以上每2 m間隔如3.3 m、5.3 m…等，取一厚約5 cm之圓盤進行樹幹解析，探討胸徑和樹高與樹齡的關係，用Smalian公式以區分求積法計算林木材積、連年生長、平均生長。由生物量與材積推估生物量擴展係數（包含地上部和地下部）。由地上部生物量擴展係數與連年生長和平均生長推估地上部生物量之連年生長(current annual increment of aboveground biomass, CAIAB)和平均生長(mean annual increment of aboveground biomass, MAIAB)，再建立生物量連年生長和平均生長與樹齡的關係。 林分生物量之估算 兩林分之造林木分別以單株林木地上部各部位生物量，或總量生物量與胸徑配置迴歸方程式，選擇最常用的自然對數式Y = a + b In (dbh)，以估算單株各部位生物量及總生物量，式中Y為地上部各部位或總量之生物量(kg)，dbh為胸徑(cm)，a和b為迴歸係數。同時，以上述迴歸式推算，胸徑與樹高之關係。另外，因迴歸式經過自然對數的轉換，常數a需經校正係數校正 (Baskerville, 1972)。至於其它喬木和灌木各部位生物量並不實測，以苗栗相思樹人工林其它喬木和灌木所建立之一組迴歸式（林國銓等，2007），包含葉、小枝條、大枝條、樹幹等植體以及總生物量之迴歸式，以胸徑估算。單株林木的迴歸式選出後，以各樣區之造林木、其它喬木、灌木資料估算出樣區之地上部生物量，再換算成單位面積之地上部各部位生物量。地下部生物量則以各樣區造林木、其它喬木、灌木地上部總生物量為基礎，乘以兩林分造林木平均根莖比，以此推估各林分不同層次之地下部生物量及全株生物量。 枝葉層及土壤 於兩林分每樣區各挖一土壤剖面，在各剖面周圍未受干擾之林地取25x25 cm枝葉層各1至2個，每林分共取5個樣本，帶回實驗室後測定其烘乾重 (65℃)。將土壤依深度區分為0-15、15-30、30-45、45-60 cm等4層，每剖面採取不同土層之土樣供碳濃度分析之用。同時，以內徑為5.4 cm之土環採樣器於距每剖面切面10-15 cm處採取不同土層之土壤，攜回實驗室測定其細土總體密度（細土指通過2 mm篩網之土壤）。 含碳量估算 以植體小樣本供碳濃度分析之用，相思樹和楓香各取8和10株樣木(含4株挖根之樣木)，使其涵蓋大部分樣木之胸徑級，進行含碳量分析。各植體以及枝葉層之樣本磨成細粉 (<0.5 mm)，以乾燒法用元素分析儀 （elementor vario EL型）測定其碳濃度 (Sollins et al., 1999)。土壤磨細(<0.5 mm)後亦以元素分析儀測定其全碳量。 為減少因各植體加總後產生之誤差，以林木地上部或地下部總生物量分別乘以林木各部位生物量加權後之平均地上部或地下部碳濃度，可估算出林木碳總貯存量。由各層次林木地上部和地下部碳總貯存量，可算出兩林分碳總貯存量。其它喬木和灌木並未測定其碳濃度，假設其它喬木和灌木植物體平均碳濃度為50%，以此加以推估。 元素分析儀 （elementor vario EL型）
以樣區造林木資料分析胸徑之分布，將胸徑依5 cm分為一級，相思樹10 cm起至35 cm以上共分6級；楓香以10 cm起至30cm以上共分5級。相思樹大致上依據樣區內各胸徑級株數之比例選取樣木株數，加上考慮粗根生物量和樹幹解析之樣木，每胸徑級內選取1~10株樣木，測定其生物量；楓香屬於私有地，伐木株數受到限制，樣木選取時每胸徑級選取1-2株，在包含平均胸徑之胸徑級則選取6株。
列出兩樹種樣木根生物量和材積
以樣區造林木資料分析胸徑之分布，將胸徑依5 cm分為一級，相思樹10 cm起至35 cm以上共分6級；楓香以10 cm起至30cm以上共分5級。相思樹大致上依據樣區內各胸徑級株數之比例選取樣木株數，加上考慮粗根生物量和樹幹解析之樣木，每胸徑級內選取1~10株樣木，測定其生物量；楓香屬於私有地，伐木株數受到限制，樣木選取時每胸徑級選取1-2株，在包含平均胸徑之胸徑級則選取6株。

台東地區相思樹與楓香兩人工林碳累積量

相思樹林位於台東縣延平鄉，屬成功事業區7林班，造林年度約在1976年，海拔高為260-300 m，坡度20-26∘，土壤為坋質黏土，其中黏粒佔35.9%，坋粒45.4%，砂粒18.7%，pH值5.7，氮含量1.32 mg g-1。根據中央氣象局台東氣象站過去30年的資料顯示：台東地區年平均溫度為24.3℃，年平均降雨量為1860 mm，5-10月為雨季，月降雨量超過150 mm；其餘月份較乾旱，月降雨量介於40-80 mm間。 121.15 121.18 22.97 22.9
楓香林則位於台東縣太麻里鄉，屬私有地，約在1980年造林，海拔高為670 m，坡度5-20∘，土壤為黏質壤土，其中黏粒佔39.1%，坋粒41.2%，砂粒19.7%，pH值4.8，氮含量1.38 mg g-1。 120.92 120.945 22.53 22.46

A studying treatments of soil and water conservation on betel nut plantation

The purpose of this project is to study the treatments of soil and water conservation on betele nut plantation. The study results showed that run off and soil losses of betel nut plantation were larger than those of China fir plantation. Based on observation data of different soilconservation treatment plots under 368mm of total rainfall for betel nut plantation, runoff ratios for treatment of Bahia cover, hillside ditch and Bahia cover, grass cover, hillside ditch and grass cover, and China fir plantaion were 0.4, 0.22, 0.49, 0.3, 1, 0.16 respectively. The results also showed that soil conservation practices could protect soil, and decrease overland flow about 50%~66%.

Effects of Typhoon Disturbances on Understory Light and Seedling Growth of Six Tree Species in a Forest at Kenting, Southern Taiwan

Starting 1 mo after typhoon Dujuan swept through Taiwan in September 2003, this research manipulated the understory light availability using artificial shading treatments in the Uplifted Coral-reef Forest at Kenting, southern Taiwan. In this study, we examined the survivorship, height growth, and net photosynthetic rates of seedlings of 6 tree species with advanced regeneration for their responses to the elevated light resources after the typhoon disturbance. These species were Diospyros discolor, D. maritima, Machilus kusanoi, Melanolepis multiglandulosa, Palaquium formosanum, and Pisonia umbellifera. Understory light availability in this forest was about 1~2% before the typhoon disturbance. Three weeks after typhoon Dujuan, the understory light was 6~ 9%. This had dropped to 2~6% after 3 mo, when leaves had partially recovered. After 15 mo, it was again 1~2%, indicating that the canopy had again closed. Seedlings of D. maritima still maintained over 80% survival when grown under less than 1% light availability for 2 yr. However, under the same situation, Mel. multiglandulosa and Pal. formosanum could only maintain a 12% survival rate. The survival rate and relative height growth rate of each species, except for Pis. umbellifera, increased with light availability but at different magnitudes. The relative height growth rates of seedlings of Mel. multiglandulosa and D. maritima showed the most significant responses to the elevated light, while those of D. discolor and Pis. umbellifera showed the least. There were also significantly positive linear relations between the net photosynthetic rates and available light intercepted by the seedlings. The highest slope of the linear regression was 0.15 for Mel. multiglandulosa, and it ranged 0.04~0.07 for the other 5 species. Compared to the shaded plots, the increased light availability after typhoon Dujuan increased the net photosynthetic rates of these seedlings. Carbon yields likewise increased. As a result, the height growth of seedlings was promoted and mortality was reduced. This was beneficial to the long-term survival of these advanced seedlings. However, these beneficial effects diminished within 1 yr as the forest canopy gradually closed again

Content: Hsiang-HuaWangTFRIAssociate research fellow53 Nan-Hai roadTaipei10066Taiwan886-2-23039978 ext.2800886-2-23076220hhwang@tfri.gov.tw
Please contact the data owner for details
Please contact the data owner for details

study site and materialsStarting 1 mo after typhoon Dujuan swept through Taiwan in September 2003, this researchmanipulated the understory light availability using artificial shading treatments in the UpliftedCoral-reef Forest at Kenting, southern Taiwan. In this study, we examined the survivorship, heightgrowth, and net photosynthetic rates of seedlings of 6 tree species with advanced regeneration fortheir responses to the elevated light resources after the typhoon disturbance. These species wereDiospyros discolor, D. maritima, Machilus kusanoi, Melanolepis multiglandulosa, Palaquiumformosanum, and Pisonia umbellifera. Understory light availability in this forest was about 1~2%before the typhoon disturbance.

study site and materialsStarting 1 mo after typhoon Dujuan swept through Taiwan in September 2003, this researchmanipulated the understory light availability using artificial shading treatments in the UpliftedCoral-reef Forest at Kenting, southern Taiwan. In this study, we examined the survivorship, heightgrowth, and net photosynthetic rates of seedlings of 6 tree species with advanced regeneration fortheir responses to the elevated light resources after the typhoon disturbance. These species wereDiospyros discolor, D. maritima, Machilus kusanoi, Melanolepis multiglandulosa, Palaquiumformosanum, and Pisonia umbellifera. Understory light availability in this forest was about 1~2%before the typhoon disturbance.
Effects of Typhoon Disturbances on Understory Light and Seedling Growth of Six Tree Species in a Forest at Kenting, Southern Taiwan

樹種之纖維型態與化學組成對應於特種紙應用性質需求之研究 Matching Fiber Morphology and Chemical Composition of Tree Species to the Applicative Quality Requirements of Specialty Papers

格拉辛紙 (glassine paper)是在高含水率下、以高壓壓製而成的具獨特光澤、亮度性質的高密度的紙張，較普通紙為薄且高透明性。本年度試驗即為以赤桉及山黃麻等二樹種，分別經由KP法製漿後，評估做為格拉辛紙之原料可行性。首先，於漿料收率方面，赤桉收率(38.4％)遠低於山黃麻漿料收率(53.9％)。於漿料之卡巴值方面，亦以山黃麻(22.3)較赤桉為低(26.9)。因本紙種須經高度打漿，纖維細胞壁不宜過厚；於纖維型態方面，二樹種漿料之纖維內腔徑與纖維徑（L/D）皆大於70，並與市售紙之間並沒有太大差異，故二樹種皆可製作出與市售格拉辛紙接近的紙張。於物理性質方面，二樹種之物理強度性質皆符合B glassine（40 g）的標準，但由於山黃麻有較高的收率、較佳的平滑度，可減少製漿成本，適合推廣利用。 Glassine paper is a kind of specialty paper formed from low consistency stock under high pressure pressing. It has high transparency, unique glossiness, and high density. The product is usually thinner and less permeable than typical grades of papers. We examined the effect of fiber morphological characteristics on the suitability of making such grade. Eucalyptus camaldulensis and Trema orientalis were used as raw materials. After kraft pulping and bleaching their suitability for making glassine paper was evaluated. With regard to pulp yields, E. camaldulensis gave yield of 38.4% while T. orientalis was a much higher 53.9%. As for the pulp kappa number, T. orientalis pulp was lower than E. camaldulensis pulp (22.3 vs. 26.9). Because this grade requires highly beaten pulp stock, fiber cell wall shall not be overly thick; the ratios of fiber lumen diameter to fiber diameter (L/D) for both species were greater than 70, similar to that of commercial product. Hence, both species are deemed adequate as raw materials for making glassine paper. The physical properties of papers formed from the 2 species all comply with the requirements of B glassine (40 gsm). Due to it much higher pulp yield, however, T. orientalis is more advantageous as a potential raw material source.
Kuang-ping Hsu Taiwan Forestry Research Institute Contracted Assistant Researcher No.53, Nanhai Rd. Taipei 10066 Taiwan (R.O.C.) +886 2 23039978 +886 2 23037832 serpjhsu@tfri.gov.tw

Content: Kuang-ping Hsu Taiwan Forestry Research Institute Contracted Assistant Researcher No.53, Nanhai Rd. Taipei 10066 Taiwan (R.O.C.) +886 2 23039978 +886 2 23037832 serpjhsu@tfri.gov.tw
Chen-lung Ho Taiwan Forestry Research Institute Associate Researcher No.53, Nanhai Rd. Taipei 10066 Taiwan (R.O.C.) +886 2 23039978 +886 2 23037832 chenlung@tfri.gov.tw

收集樣本材料 收集不同樹種材料，樹種選擇以速生樹種為主，如：山黃麻（Trema orientalis）、赤桉（Eucalyptus camaldulensis）等樹種。並收集市售之格拉辛紙做對照。 纖維形態評估與分析 使用Franklin’s Method將纖維解離，即將不同樹種之木絲樣本，使用1份過氧化氫，5份冰醋酸，4份蒸餾水之解離液中進行解纖。於40℃烘箱中放置7天左右（或60℃中約48小時），至木絲呈透明白色，取出一部份纖維狀之管胞於載玻片上，用番紅（Safranin-o）染色後，在Nikon投影機（Profile projector）下，每一樣品取200根，並分別量測量測纖維長度、纖維寬度、纖維長寬比及細胞壁厚度等。 製漿試驗 本試驗以硫酸鹽製漿法（Sulfate Process, KP）製漿，其蒸煮條件如下： 樣本絕乾量 150 g/每罐 用鹼量（NaOH） 16 ％ 硫化度 25 ％ 液比(L/Kg) 1：4 開始溫度 室溫 最高溫 160 ℃ 升溫時間 90 min 最高溫保持時間 90 min 漂白試驗 i. 氨水製造: 在500 mL枝付圓底蒸餾燒瓶內加入KClO3 100g和草酸40g，水浴加溫至45℃，並從上方漏斗滴下33％的硫酸，產生的ClO2氣體經由管子通至飽和NaCl溶液洗滌，通入冰冷的蒸餾水中，即得到ClO2溶液。 ii. 標定ClO2 在300mL有栓三角燒瓶中，加入50mL蒸餾水、10％KI 20mL、20%H2SO4 5mL，再加入ClO2 10mL，利用0.1N Na2S2O3滴定游離的I2，即可算出ClO2含量。 0.1N Na2S2O3 1mL=0.00135g ClO2 iii. 將紙漿根據表2 紙漿漂白程序進行漂白。 抄紙試驗 將漂白後的紙漿，利用荷蘭式打漿機經游離式打漿，游離度控制在200、140、80，根據CNS11212物理試驗用手抄紙抄造法以圓形抄紙機抄造成紙，進行紙張物理性質試驗。 荷蘭式打漿機 灰分(ash) 將絕乾樣本2~3克放入鉗鍋中，置入灰化爐中，設定升溫時間90分鐘，溫度575℃，灰化時間約7～8小時，進行灰化，待溫度降至100℃左右時，秤重，計算出灰分（％）＝ 灰分重 / 絕乾木粉重 × 100％。 醇苯萃出物 將樣本置入筒狀濾紙中，以100℃萃取至虹吸管內之醇苯混合溶液（乙醇：苯=1：2），並維持每小時3～4次的回餾，經過每次6小時、三次抽出，濾紙層之醇苯混合液呈透明無色即可，抽出瓶溶液以濃縮機濃縮至乾燥，烘乾秤重，計算醇苯抽出物含量。醇苯抽出物（％）＝抽出物重量 / 木粉絕乾重 × 100％ 木質素含量分析 取醇苯萃取後之絕乾樣本1g，加入72%硫酸15ml於15℃冰浴中反應2小時，之後加入575ml蒸餾水以121℃，反應30分鐘，使其達充分酸水解。以1G3濾杯過濾，其過濾下之濾液定容至1000ml。過濾後之木粉烘乾，秤重（酸不可溶木質素），濾液以分光光度計（波長208 nm）測定其ABS值。利用下列公式計算出木質素含量。 酸不可溶木質素％ ＝ 酸不可溶木質素 / 絕乾木粉重 × 100％ 酸可溶木質素％ ＝（ D × V × abs / a × w ）× 100％ D：稀釋倍數，V：濾液體積，a：113 Lg(波長208nm時)，w：木粉絕乾重（g） 木質素總含量＝酸不可溶木質素＋酸可溶木質素 木質素含量％＝木質素總含量％ × （1－醇苯抽出物％） 分光光度計 全纖維素含量分析 取醇苯萃取後之絕乾樣本2.5g，加入150ml蒸餾水及NaClO2，1g、冰醋酸0.2ml，並以70~80℃水浴鍋中加熱，每間隔1小時加入NaClO2，1g、冰醋酸0.2ml一次，重複4次。反應完成後，以1G3玻璃濾杯過濾，其濾杯中之全纖維素以500ml之蒸餾水水洗再以50ml丙酮洗去多餘NaClO2殘留，烘乾並秤重，計算出全纖維素含量。 全纖維素（％）＝ 全纖維素之重 / 絕乾木粉重 × 100％ α纖維素含量分析 取全纖維素絕乾1g，置於20℃水浴鍋中，加入17.5%氫氧化鈉15ml攪拌1分鐘，加入17.5%氫氧化鈉10ml攪拌45秒，加入17.5%氫氧化鈉10ml攪拌15秒，靜置3分鐘，再加入17.5%氫氧化鈉10ml反應2.5分鐘，並重複4次。靜置30分鐘後加入20℃100ml蒸餾水，靜置30分鐘。反應完成後，以1G3濾杯過濾，再以8.3%氫氧化鈉25ml潤洗。以20℃250ml蒸餾水洗去氫氧化鈉殘留，最後以2N的醋酸淹過α纖維素並計時5分鐘，在以20℃400ml的蒸餾水洗去醋酸的殘留。烘乾並秤重。α纖維素含量為全纖維素含量×α纖維素％。 β+γ纖維素含量分析 將全纖維素含量- α纖維素含量，所得值即為β+γ纖維素含量。 紙張物理性質試驗 將抄好的圓形紙，進行下列的紙張物理性質試驗。 CNS1352 紙及紙板基重試驗法 CNS1355 紙及紙板撕裂強度試驗法 CNS1466 紙漿、紙及紙板白度試驗法 CNS2513 紙及紙板平滑度試驗法 CNS12607 紙及紙板抗張性質試驗法 CNS10378 紙及紙板耐折強度試驗法 CNS2387 紙之不透明度試驗法 CNS1357 紙及紙板透氣性試驗法 ISO2758 Paper-Determination of bursting strength CNS3685 紙及紙板厚度及密度試驗法
表1 格拉辛紙與樹種材料之纖維形態
表3 市售格拉辛紙與不同樹種手抄紙之紙張物理性質
表4 市售格拉辛紙與不同樹種手抄紙之紙張物理強度性質

表3 市售格拉辛紙與不同樹種手抄紙之紙張物理性質
表4 市售格拉辛紙與不同樹種手抄紙之紙張物理強度性質

Tracheid length and micofibril Taiwania grown under different thinning and pruning treatments

The effects of different thinning and pruning methods on the tracheid length and microfibril angle of young Taiwania (Taiwania cryptomerioides Hay) were investigated. No significant differences were found for tracheid length and microfibril angle among the three thinning and pruning treatments. The tracheid length increases outwards from the pith. The radial variation in microfibril angle is high near the pith, and declines gradually towards the cambium. The tracheid length values increase with decreasing microfibril angle.
Cheng-JungLinTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteDivision of Forest Utilizationzzlin@tfri.gov.tw
Chih-MingChiuTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteDivision of Forest Managementcmchiu@tfri.gov.tw

Content: Chih-MingChiuTaiwan Forestry Research InstituteDivision of Forest Managementcmchiu@tfri.gov.tw

The study site was located in the No. 12, Liukuei Experimental Forest of the Taiwan Forestry Research Institute (TFRI), Kaohsiung County, Taiwan, R.O.C. The area of the study site was about 2.0 ha, divided into 27 plots, each about 0.04 ha in area, including a buffer zone. The three types of thinning treatments were heavy thinning (basal area 28 m2/ha. at diameter breast height [DBH, about 1.3 m. above the ground]), moderate thinning (33 m2/ha.), and control (42 m2/ha.).The heavy-thinning and moderate-thinning treatments harvested stocks from the original 42 (m2/ha) to retain 28 (m2/ha) and 33 (m2/ha), respectively. The three types of pruning treatments were heavy pruning (4.5 m), moderate pruning (3.6m), and control (non-pruning). The heavy-pruning and moderate-pruning treatments represented trees that were pruned from the root base upward to 4.5 m and 3.6 m of the tree height, respectively. The study plantation was planted at an initial density of 1750 trees/ha in 1980. Thinning and pruning treatments were implemented in 1990.Three levels of thinning were combined with another three levels of pruning treatment. Therefore, nine silvicultural practices (3 thinning × 3 pruning treatments) were used in this study. The same thinning and pruning treatment plots were repeated three times, for a total of 27 sample plots in the experimental design.There is large tree-to-tree (inter-tree) and within-tree variation in wood properties within a species; even the trees have the same age and grow in the same condition. In this study, the diameter and height of each tree on the 27 small plots were all measured. We had studied the structure of thinning and pruning treatments of Taiwania stands and the expected and fitted Weibull distribution of diameter breast height (DBH) classes for Taiwania plantations after thinning and pruning treatments. To eliminate the variation in this study, trees (samples) were removed only from the mediate tree per plot. In other words, we sampled 3 trees (one [mediate] tree was selected from each plot) of each treatment. The data set consisted of one tree × three replicas (plots) × three thinning treatments × three pruning treatments. In total, 27 trees were investigated for tracheid length and MFA. Each tree had more than nine trachied lengths and MFAs according to the number of rings examined, respectively.First, the diameter and height of each tree on the 27 small plots were measured. The average DBHs and tree heights are shown in Table 1. A mean diameter from the trees was selected from each plot (3 trees per treatment), and a total of 27 sample trees were cut. These trees were harvested on February 14-15, 2001, when they were about 20 years old.One cross-sectional disc (10 cm thick) was cut from each sample tree at the position of its DBH. A pith-to-bark strip about 1 cm wide and 1.5 cm thick was sawn along an average radius from each disk. The diametrical strip was sawn from each disc in the same direction, and each strip was subdivided into growth rings as measuring units. Matchstick-size specimens were trimmed to contain only one growth ring (earlywood and latewood), and then soaked in test tubes with a maceration solution (H2O2: CH3COOH: distilled H2O = 1: 4: 5). These then were heated at less than 40℃ for 72 h until the color of the specimens became transparently white. Then the specimens were removed from the test tubes and washed with distilled water. The bundles of macerated tracheids were stirred and separated with a glass rod, and then stained with Safrain-O.Tracheid length (TL) - In order to compare tracheid length and microfibril angle (MFA) data on the ring, ring boundary positions for each sample were obtained using Resistograph. The within-ring variances of density and the ring boundaries have been reported in an earlier paper. Fortunately, the density profiles for these samples did show clear boundaries. To eliminate within-ring variance in this study, fibers were removed only from the third outermost location of earlywood and all latewood (annual ring). Three or four tangential sections, 0.2 mm in thickness, were prepared from each measuring point in the outermost annual ring. After maceration, the tracheids were then washed, dispersed, and mounted on microscope slides.The number of measurements required was determined through a series of preliminary measurements and using formula N=t2αS2/E2, where t is the student’s t value at the α probability level, i.e. α<=0.01 in this study, S2 is the variation of preliminary sample, and E is the allowable error set at 10% of the mean earlywood/latewood tracheid length. Based on the results of the preliminary measurement, 60 earlywood and 60 latewood tracheids from a fiber slide were selected and measured, respectively. The 60 tracheids from each earlywood and latewood were measured using a light microscope with a photograph system, respectively. Therefore, there are 120 measurements per each ring (earlywood and latewood) in this study.In this study, the difference is tracheid length between the earlywood and the latewood there are slight variation, and the mean latewood tracheid length longer than the mean earlywood. Therefore, the mean length of 60 entire earlywood and 60 entire latewood tracheids was used to represent the tracheid length for each individual ring. In other words, the average length of 120 tracheids was used as the tracheid length for each individual growth ring. Thus, more than 29,160 tracheid lengths were measured (120 replicates × more than 9 rings × 3 trees × 3 thinning treatments × 3 pruning treatments).Micrifibril angle (MFA) - The MFA can be measured by a wide range of techniques, such as the angle of the slit pits, polarizing, fluorescent and electron microscopy, iodine staining, X-ray diffraction, soft-rot cavity method, sonication (ultrasonic treatment), light microscopy, SilviScan.In this study, three or four tangential sections, 0.2 mm in thickness, were also prepared from each measuring point in the latewood. After maceration, the tracheids were also then washed, dispersed, and mounted on microscope slides. One MFA (the orientation of the cellulose microfibrils) was measured per tracheid utilizing the common method. The common procedure for measuring MFAs is to dry specimens rapidly. The rapid shrinkage and high drying stresses cause the cell walls to check and split along the direction of the microfibrils in the S2 layer. Subsequent staining enhances the cracks for measurement by light microscopy (observation of images). When cell-wall cracks are not present, the angle of elongated pit apertures can be measured, another technique regarded as being closely aligned with the MFA of the S2 cell-wall layer. It is agreeable to have a simple, direct, and correct method for MFA determination. Although the method has disadvantages, cracks and pit apertures cannot always be found in sufficient quantit.We regarded the angle of pit apertures against the cell axis on tangential walls of latewood tracheids as the MFA. The angle of the pit aperture is parallel to the MFA of the S2 layer of the cell, and Taiwania usually has a lot of tangential pittings in latewood. One average MFA was measured on individual tracheids. Thereafter, the MFAs were measured in thirty tracheids from each latewood using a light microscope with a photograph system.Thirty measurements were completed for each latewood to obtain a satisfactory estimated means each ring. Therefore, the average angle from each 30 tracheids was taken to be the angle of the ring and was used to represent the MFA in each ring. Each tree had more than 9 MFAs according to the number of rings examined. Thus, more than 7,290 tracheid lengths were measured (30 replicates × more than 9 rings × 3 trees × 3 thinning treatments × 3 pruning treatments).
the tracheid from each earlywood segment were measured were measured using a light microscope with a photograph system 50X
the tracheid from each latewood segment were measured were measured using a light microscope with a photograph system 50X
microfibril angle were measured by the angle of the slit pits of latewood method, the degree between slit and the axial of tracleid for latewood.

蓮華池研究中心木屋蛙類聲景錄音檔

本資料集所描述的是智慧生態計畫－生態及生物多樣性資訊基礎建設與應用計畫於本所蓮華池研究中心木屋旁所設置的固定式錄音設備，目的在於長期監測蛙類聲景變化。本觀測點為全天候24小時待命，每15分鐘錄音2分鐘。所有的錄音資料，均可於生態感測資料展示平台（http://iesn.tfri.gov.tw）上查閱，並以開放資料形式提供生態感測開放資料平台(http://iesn.tfri.gov.tw/forestDW/OpenData)作為資料來源之一。
